Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:shut down
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:Create instructions on how to [KEYWORD] the [PRODUCT].
Answer Sentence:Create instructions on how to [KEYWORD] the [PRODUCT].
Temp:0.8
Length:500

Create instructions on how to shut down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

To shutdown the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, follow these instructions:
1. Exit the software suite (by clicking on the "X" in the top-left corner of the main window).
2. On Windows, click on "Start", type "cmd" in the Start search box, and press Enter.
3. In the command prompt window, type "shutdown -s -t 0" and press Enter.
4. On Mac OS X, open a Terminal window (found in Applications/Utilities).
5. Type "/usr/local/bin/shutdown -s -t 0" and press Enter.

createQADocument

Answer Sentence:Create instructions on how to [KEYWORD] the [PRODUCT].
Temp:0.8
Length:500

Create instructions on how to reset the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

To reset the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite:

1. Close all open applications on your computer.
2. Click on “Start” and select “Control Panel” from the list of options that appears.
3. Double-click on “System Protection” icon to open it.
4. On the window that opens, click on the “Reset Windows Settings” button.
5. After clicking on the “Reset Windows Settings” button, a new window will open asking you to confirm your choice. Click on the “Reset Windows Settings” button again to complete the process.
6. After resetting your computer, restart it in order for the changes to take effect.

Create instructions on how to wipe the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

1. To start, open the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite.
2. Click on the "Wipe Data" button on the toolbar.
3. Select the data you want to wipe and click the "Start Wiping" button.
4. The software will remove any unwanted data and close automatically.

Create instructions on how to update the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

1. Open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on your computer.

2. Click the "Update" button in the main toolbar.

3. Review the update information and click the "Update Now" button to proceed with the update.

4. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the update process.

Create instructions on how to install the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

1. Download the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite from our website.

2. Install the software on your computer.

3. Open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and create an account.

4. Select a location on your map and start navigating.

How do you install the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

To install the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on your computer, please follow these steps:



1.Download and install the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. The download link is provided at the bottom of this page.


2.Start the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and follow the instructions on the screen.


3.If you have a Google Earth account, sign in with your Google Earth user name and password to access our mapping features. If you do not have a Google Earth account, you can create one by clicking on the "sign up" button below the map.

How do you enable night mode with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

To enable night mode in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite: 1. Open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. 2. Click on the "Settings" tab. 3. Under "General Settings," click on the "Night Mode" button. 4. In the "Night Mode" dialog box, select the desired night mode and click OK.

Length:500

How do you disable night mode with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

There is no one definitive answer to this question, as the Night Mode feature may vary depending on which Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite you are using. However, some common methods for disabling night mode with different boat navigation software suites include:

1. Changing the brightness setting on your device to a lower number.

2. Enabling " sunrise-sunset " time options so that night mode is turned off automatically at sunrise and sunset.

3. Using the " Disable Night Mode " feature in the settings menu of your boat navigation software suite.

How do you enable real time tracking with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

How do you disable the fishfinder function with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

Answer

How do you enable the doppler radar with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

Enable the doppler radar with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite by following these steps:

1. Click on the "Settings" icon in the toolbar.
2. Under "System Settings," click on "Radar."
3. Enable the "Doppler Radar" checkbox and enter your vessel's latitude, longitude and height above sea level in the corresponding fields.
4. Click on "Apply."

Create instructions on how to enable night mode with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

To enable night mode:
1. Open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and select "Settings" from the main menu.
2. Select "Interface" from the Settings menu and select the "Night Mode" button.
3. The Night Mode settings screen will appear. Select the checkbox next to "Enable night mode."
4. Click the OK button to finish setting up Night Mode.

Create instructions on how to disable night mode with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

1. Click the "Night Mode" switch to disable night mode on the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

2. If you want to enable night mode again, click the "Night Mode" switch and it will turn back on.

Create instructions on how to enable real time tracking with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

1. Launch the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application on your computer.

2. Click on the "Settings" tab at the top of the application window.

3. In the "Settings" window, select the "Real-time Tracking" checkbox and click on the "Save" button.

4. You will now be able to track your boat's position in real time by clicking on the "Track Now" button.

Length:500

Create instructions on how to disable the fishfinder function with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

1. Open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and choose Menu > Setup > System.
2. In the "System" window, click on the "Hardware" tab.
3. In the "Hardware" window, click on the "Fish Finder" button.
4. In the "Fish Finder" window, uncheck the "Enable Fish Finder" check box.

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Version:1
Title Sentence:Create instructions on how to [KEYWORD] the [PRODUCT].
Answer Sentence:Create instructions on how to [KEYWORD] the [PRODUCT].
Temp:0.8
Length:500

Create instructions on how to enable the doppler radar with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

To use the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite to enable the doppler radar:

1. Open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and click on the "Settings" button.

2. On the "Settings" screen, click on the "Doppler Radar" button.

3. On the "Doppler Radar" screen, you will need to enter your licence number and password in order to access the settings.

4. Next, you will need to select whether you want to use the built-in Doppler Radar or attach an external Doppler Radar device. If you are using an external Doppler Radar, you will also need to specify the type of device (i.e., VHF or UHF).

5. Finally, you will need to set your interrogation frequency and tracking speed.

Answer Sentence:How does [KEYWORD] work with the [PRODUCT]?

Length:500

How does real time tracking work with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite captures real-time information about the boat’s position, heading and speed. This data is then used to generate a navigation solution that can be displayed on the computer screen or sent to the Guidare navigation system for use in navigating the boat.

createQADocument

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Version:1
Title Sentence:How does [KEYWORD] work with the [PRODUCT]?
Answer Sentence:How does [KEYWORD] work with the [PRODUCT]?
Temp:0.8
Length:500

How does wind capturing work with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

The Guidare Boat Navigation Suite calculates the wind speed and direction at each point on the vessel's path. Wind data is then captured by the Guidare system and used to update the vessel's heading and speed.

How does monitoring the bottom of the ocean work with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite includes a bottom-monitoring feature that can be used to keep track of the boat's location and movement in the ocean. By monitoring the bottom, the software can also warn users if they are approaching dangerous areas or objects.

Answer Sentence:How does [KEYWORD] work with the [PRODUCT]?

Length:500

How does identification of vessels work with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite includes a Vessel Identification Module that can be used to identify vessels in real-time. The Vessel Identification Module uses a variety of data sources, including radar, optical navigation, and digital multilateration sensors, to identify the vessel's size, shape, and other characteristics.

Explain to me how real time tracking works with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

If you are using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, it will track your position in real time. This means that as you move around on your boat, the software will keep track of your location and transmit this information to your computer. You can then use this information to plot your boat's route or even just watch where you are going as you cruise down the river!

Explain to me how monitoring the bottom of the ocean works with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite can monitor the bottom of the ocean to help you find your way. The software uses a variety of sensors to detect objects and signals in the water, and it uses this information to create a map that shows where you are and how to get to your destination.

Explain to me how identification of vessels works with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite?

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Answer

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite uses Vessel Identification Systems to automatically track and identify vessels in your vicinity. This information is then used to provide navigation, safety, and communication assistance.

Length:500

How to solve a stuck device for Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on a Mercury.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Problem

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is experiencing an issue with a device.

Symptoms

There are a few symptoms that could be indicating that the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is experiencing an issue with a device. One possible symptom is that the software will not open or start up. Another possible symptom is that the software may show inaccurate data or inaccurate maps.

How to solve

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is experiencing a problem with a device on your computer. We have identified the issue and are working to resolve it as quickly as possible. In the meantime, we recommend that you use another navigation software package until this issue is resolved.

How to solve a blank screen for Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on a Mercury.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Problem

When starting the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite, you may get a blank screen.

Symptoms

The symptoms of this problem may include getting a blank screen when starting the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite.

How to solve

One possible solution for this problem is to make sure your computer has the latest updates installed. You can check to see if there are any updates available by clicking on "Windows Update" in the Start menu. If there are any updates available, you can install them by clicking on "Install Updates" in the Windows Update window.

Temp:0.8
Length:500

How to solve a spinning progress bar for Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on a Mercury.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Problem

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite has a spinning progress bar that appears to be frozen in place.

Symptoms

The symptoms for this problem would be a spinning progress bar that appears to be frozen in place.

How to solve

There could be a number of reasons why the spinning progress bar might be frozen in place. One potential cause is if there is a problem with the software itself, such as a missing file or an incorrect installation. If the problem is with the software, you will need to reinstall it.

If the spinning progress bar is frozen due to a problem with your internet connection, you can try restarting your computer and/or attempting to connect to the internet through a different device. If that doesn't work, you may need to reset your browser settings.

createInternalSupportDocument

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:a map not being displayed
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:How to solve [KEYWORD] for [PRODUCT] on a [BOAT].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: The [PRODUCT] has [KEYWORD].
Symptoms Sentence:What are the symptoms for the following problem: The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite has a map not being displayed..
Instructions Sentence:Create a solution for the following problem: The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite has a map not being displayed..
Temp:0.8
Length:500

How to solve a map not being displayed for Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on a Mercury.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Problem

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite has a map not being displayed.

Symptoms

The most common symptom of this problem is that the user cannot see the map on their screen. There are a few possible causes for this:

1. The map may be too large for the screen resolution. This can be fixed by downloading a smaller version of the map, or by decreasing the screen resolution.

2. The map may be outdated. If you have recently updated the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, it may not have installed the latest map yet. Try updating the software again, or downloading and installing a new map from our website.

3. There may be a problem with your computer's graphics card. Try restarting your computer, or upgrading your graphics card.

How to solve

There could be a number of reasons why the map might not be displaying. One possibility is that the map might not have been downloaded to the computer that is using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Another possibility is that there might be a problem with the software itself. If you are having difficulty displaying the map, it might be helpful to try resetting the software or rebooting your computer.

createInternalSupportDocument

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:no connection to sensors
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:How to solve [KEYWORD] for [PRODUCT] on a [BOAT].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: The [PRODUCT] has [KEYWORD].
Symptoms Sentence:What are the symptoms for the following problem: The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite does not have any connection to sensors, which means that it is unable to track the boat's position or administer commands to the boat's motors. This can lead to problems if the boat gets lost or if there is an emergency situation and the software must be used to navigate the boat..
Instructions Sentence:Create a solution for the following problem: The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite does not have any connection to sensors, which means that it is unable to track the boat's position or administer commands to the boat's motors. This can lead to problems if the boat gets lost or if there is an emergency situation and the software must be used to navigate the boat..
Temp:0.8
Length:500

How to solve no connection to sensors for Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on a Mercury.

For model: Mercury, version: 1

Problem

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite does not have any connection to sensors, which means that it is unable to track the boat's position or administer commands to the boat's motors. This can lead to problems if the boat gets lost or if there is an emergency situation and the software must be used to navigate the boat.

Symptoms

There are a few possible symptoms for this problem: the boat could get lost, there could be a malfunction with the boat's motors, or the software could not be able to connect to any sensors.

How to solve

One possible solution is to install a separate navigation system, such as a GPS system, on the boat. This would allow the software on the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite to track the boat's position and administer commands to the motors.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

I need a fix for the device is stuck on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for the device is stuck on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

The device is stuck on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. I have tried restarting the software suite, uninstalling it and reinstalling it, and even downloading updated versions. Nothing seems to work.

Comment

First try restarting your computer and the device. If that doesn’t help, please follow the instructions below to uninstall and reinstall the software suite.

Comment

There might be a problem with the USB connector on your computer. Try re-connecting it to your computer and/or replacing the USB connector. If that doesn't work, there might be a problem with the software suite itself. Try reinstalling it.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:the progress bar keeps spinning
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:I need a fix for [KEYWORD] on my [PRODUCT].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: I need a fix for the progress bar keeps spinning on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

I need a fix for the progress bar keeps spinning on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for the progress bar keeps spinning on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

The progress bar on my Guidare Boat Navigation software keeps spinning. The reason I believe it's related to the software is because when I open the program and try to navigate, the progress bar usually starts spinning after a minute or so, but eventually reaches the end. However, if I Close the software without navigating first, and then reopen it, the progress bar will start from the beginning and usually reach the end about half way through the navigation.

Comment

If you are experiencing the progress bar spinning or jumpy behaviour, it may be due to how your computer is configured. Normally, when a program initializes (such as Guidare Boat Navigation), it will check to see if your screen also needs to be initialized. This can cause a delay in starting up the navigation software if your display is busy refreshing (like when you first start your computer up in the morning). Try exiting Guidare Boat Navigation and opening it again without first navigating; this should hopefully avoid any delays and fix the issue.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:the map is not being displayed
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:I need a fix for [KEYWORD] on my [PRODUCT].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: I need a fix for the map is not being displayed on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

I need a fix for the map is not being displayed on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for the map is not being displayed on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

intermittent trouble loading tap to zoom for map on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Status: This problem has been ongoing and does not seem to be resolving.
Issue: As I try to open the map for navigation, there is an intermittent trouble loading tap to zoom feature. It starts working after waiting a few seconds, then stops working again and needs to be re-activated. This problem has been ongoing and does not seem to be resolving

Comment

.
Action needed:

There could be a few potential causes of this issue. First, it may be that there is an error with the navigation data tiles or map elements loading. If you are having trouble downloading certain map tiles or elements, try restarting your computer or refreshing your browser cache. If that does not help, please send us an email and we'd be happy to look into it further.

Another possible cause of this problem could be interference from other wireless devices in your area. Some navigation systems use wireless technology to manage maps and navaids, so check to see if there are any other devices broadcasting near your computer or navigation system. Try temporarily disabling any wireless networks or individual devices in your area until the issue resolves itself.

I need a fix for there is no connection to the sensors on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for there is no connection to the sensors on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

There is no connection to the sensors on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software. I tried multiple USB ports and different routers and still no luck.

Comment

There could be a number of reasons why the sensors on your boat navigation software do not communicate with each other or with the computer. One possibility is that you are not connected to the boat navigation software's network or USB port directly. You may also need to verify that the boat navigation software is properly installed and configured.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:cannot connect to Panoptix device
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:I need a fix for [KEYWORD] on my [PRODUCT].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: I need a fix for cannot connect to Panoptix device on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

I need a fix for cannot connect to Panoptix device on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for cannot connect to Panoptix device on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

I am having problems with my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite not being able to connect to my Panoptix device. I have tried connecting through the software, through my network connection, and even through different ports on my modem/router. Nothing is working.

Comment

There could be a few reasons why your Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is not connecting to your Panoptix device. Here are some tips to help troubleshoot the issue:

1. Make sure that you are using the latest version of Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and Panoptix device software.
2. Try connecting to Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite through your network connection instead of directly connecting to the server.
3. Try connecting to Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite through a different port on your modem/router.
4. If you are still having difficulty connecting, please submit a support ticket and we will do our best to help you out.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:cannot connect other devices
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:I need a fix for [KEYWORD] on my [PRODUCT].

Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: I need a fix for cannot connect other devices on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

I need a fix for cannot connect other devices on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for cannot connect other devices on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

I am having trouble connecting other devices to my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. I have tried re- installing the software, updating the software, and changing network settings. Nothing has worked.

Comment

There could be a number of reasons why you are having difficulties connecting your devices to your boat navigation software suite. Below are some tips to troubleshoot and resolve the issue:

-Try re-installing the boat navigation software suite, updating the software, and/or changing network settings. Sometimes users will have to reinstall the software in order for it to recognize their devices. Be sure to keep all your device drivers and software updated so that they are compatible with each other.

-If you have just purchased a new device, be sure to download the latest driver from the manufacturer’s website and install it prior to using your device with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

-If you're still encountering difficulty connecting your devices, please contact our technical support team at 1 (866) 927 – 0122 to discuss a possible solution.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:cannot connect to built in wifi
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:I need a fix for [KEYWORD] on my [PRODUCT].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: I need a fix for cannot connect to built in wifi on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

I need a fix for cannot connect to built in wifi on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for cannot connect to built in wifi on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

I am trying to connect to my built in wifi on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite but I am not able to. I have tried all different connections and variations of network setups but nothing is working.

Comment

There could be several reasons why your are not connecting to your on-board wifi:
-One possibility is that the wifi has been turned off accidentally or not configured correctly on your device. If you only have a single-band cable connection, try using an ethernet cord or WWAN dongle to make a better connection.
-Another possibility is that your router is not functioning properly. Verify that all cables are securely plugged in and that the router is connected to the modem/cable service provider with an adequate signal strength. If you still can’t connect, consider upgrading your router.
-If you are renting or borrowing a boat from a marina or dock, you may need to ask for their wifi login information before attempting to connect.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, the device is stuck.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, the device is stuck.

Symptoms

The device is stuck and the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite is not opening properly.

Comment

If you are having trouble accessing the software suite, please check these common steps:

- Make sure that you have uninstalled/ransformed any previous versions of the Guidare Boat Navigation software.
- Check your internet connection and modem. Sometimes buffering can cause instability with connecting to our servers.
- Verify that the USB cable is plugged in fully, correctly and properly to your computer's USB port.(This is especially important if you are using an older or different make/model of Windows....ours spells out which one it should be)
- If all else fails, please submit a ticket for tech support.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:i have a blank screen
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:When using the product [PRODUCT] on my [BOAT], [KEYWORD].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, i have a blank screen.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, i have a blank screen.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, i have a blank screen.

Symptoms

Every time I open Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, all I get is a blank screen.

Comment

There could be several reasons why you're getting a blank screen when you open Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. One possibility is that your software is missing required updates or features. You can check for updates by clicking on the "Update" button in the software's main menu, or by accessing the Help menu and selecting "Check for Updates." Another possibility is that your computer doesn't have the necessary hardware requirements to run Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Check to see if your computer has an latest graphics card and enough memory to run the software. If your computer doesn't meet the requirements, you'll need to purchase a new machine or upgrade your current one. Finally, one possible solution is to check your internet connection. If you're having difficulty loading the software, make sure you're connected to the internet and that your computer is configured properly for downloads.

If that does not solve the issue, please feel free to reach out again and we would be happy to further assist you.

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:When using the product [PRODUCT] on my [BOAT], [KEYWORD].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, there is no connection to the sensors.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, there is no connection to the sensors.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, there is no connection to the sensors.

Symptoms

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, there is no connection to the sensors.

Comment

Hello! Thank you for reaching out. We absolutely apologize if your product was not compatible with your Mercury. Guidare offers two versions of our boat navigation software - mariner and captain. Our captain version is designed specifically for boats with in-dash navigational systems like your Mercury. If you have a mariner version of our software, we recommend that you update to the captain version to ensure compatibility. With our software, you can chart your course, track your vessel's position, view weather sensors, and much more! If you have further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at support@guidare.com. We appreciate your interest in our product!

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:enable the real time tracker
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is shutting down the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, when using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, I have found that it shuts down automatically after a set period of time. I would like to be able to keep using the application without it shutting down. What can I do to enable the real time tracker in the application?

Comment

Since MercuryAPP shuts down automatically after a set period of time and you'd like to keep using the application, there a few ways you could go about this. One option is to set up or create a task or script that automatically opens the MercuryAPP every time you start your computer," said Harris Mooradian, CTO at CoreNT. "Or alternatively, you could install a separate app completely for tracking navigation, which would run in the background without resorting to any automation."

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:disable the wind capture function
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is shutting down the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Eze-Cwik has been experiencing performance issues recently. The wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

The wind capture function strips all the useful data from aerial image and route plotted images whenvikings position is too close to the ground. This just makes routes worthless, as it's impossible to determine how to get from A to B without first establishing a birdseye view of the landscape. To disable this feature, go to:
A:\Program Files (x86)\GRIFFITH BROTHERS LLC\Mariner EZE-CWIW GPS 7.2\Config
Under Filters, add WichWindStoreden(). Change its value from 1 to 0. Restart Mercury. Problems should now be resolved.

Comment

It sounds like the wind striping function is shutting down the application when Vikings get too close to the ground, preventing them from using the software correctly. To fix the issue, disable the wind striping function in theConfig file. Doing so should resolve the performance issues.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:activating the vessel identification
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is shutting down the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Activating the Vessel Identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

If the Vessel Identification Feature is activated, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite will no longer function properly. In order to continue using the Software Suite, please deactivate this feature.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:changing the maps
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is shutting down the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: changing the maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: changing the maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: changing the maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Mercury has a nav system that includes haptic feedback to help the driver maintain their course. The software suite used to control the nav system suffers from intermittent errors that trigger when the maps are changed. Once the maps are changed, the software pulls down the other applications that rely on the guidance data, leading to lost position and navigation. Changing the maps forces Mercury's guidance system to restart, exacerbating the problem.

Comment

A possible solution to this problem could involve integrating a piloting system into the nav system. This piloting system could take the place of the software suite used to control the nav system, and would be responsible for taking the user's current position and navigating them to their desired destination. In cases where the map changes cause navigation problems, the piloting system would help to smoothly resettle Mercury's position, minimizing regression caused by map changes.

The old one was intermittently shutting down, so I switched to the new application. Now whenever I try to map a new route, the application shuts down. What can I do to solve the problem?

Comment

You may need to make sure the user's Administrator privileges are active on the computer.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The autopilot on my Mercury is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. I have tried turning off and on the autopilot, changing the batteries, and reinstalling the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Nothing seems to work.

Comment

There might be a problem with the electronic equipment on your boat, which may be affecting the functionality of the autopilot. It’s possible that tampering with this equipment could cause it to malfunction indefinitely. In order to troubleshoot this issue, you may need to bring your boat in for repair or visit a marine electronics specialist.

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

"Our Mercury contains a Fishfinder and the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Unfortunately, the Fishfinder is turning on the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application which disable's the Mercury's ability to use its navigational functions."

Comment

The instrument panel must be configured correctly to enable the Mercury's navigational systems. Verify that the Fishfinder is turned off and that the appropriate buttons on the instrument panel are pushed to configure the vessel's nav system. Once configuration is complete, make sure all button reminders on the instrument panel have been reset before activating the Fishfinder again.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:connecting to the internal wifi
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is shutting down the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have a mercury 2007 model with the navigations application. I have been encountering an issue where my connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. This occurs on whichever wifi network I am connected to. I have tried a few different networks, and it seems to be specific to this particular network. I've tried clearing the cache and resetting everything, butnothing seems to work. Does anyone know how to fix this?

Comment

There could be a number of reasons why your Mercury navigation software is shutting down when connected to a wifi network. Many times the culprit is an active ad blocking program or browser extension that is slowing down the network connection and causing programs licenced through Mercury such as Guidare Boat Navigation Suite to crash. Another potential culprit could be DNS caching (a feature used by networks to speed up connections by resolving IP addresses into directional Gateway and Nameserver PFN lookups). Mercury updates their software every few weeks so it is possible that on your particular network there has been an incompatible change that is causing the software to fail. If you are unable to resolve the issue on your own, please contact Mercury support for further assistance.

Alternatively, if you need to use the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, you may want to install it on a separate computer from the BlueChart maps application.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury On my vehicle, when I try to connect to the sonar to use astro, it shuts down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software suite application.

Comment

I'm sorry to hear that you're having difficulty connecting your Mercury to the sonar. The Mercury is designed with a standard soundscan radio system, which usually does not include an astro function. To use astro on a Mercury, you'll need to purchase and install a separate Caroline Connect system or upgrade your sound system.

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The user is experiencing an issue with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application where the connection to sonar is causing the application to shutdown.

Comment

Thank you for reaching out to Guidare. We are sorry to hear that you are having trouble connecting to the sonar features of our Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Some possible causes of this issue could include incorrect settings in your router or firewall, an inadequate satellite signal, or a inefficient USB link between the computer and the sonar device. If you are experiencing this issue regularly, we recommend speaking with your internet service provider (ISP) or search for help online to troubleshoot the problem. In addition, we recommend that you verify that your USB cable is correctly plugged into both the computer and the sonar device, and ensure that both devices are installed properly on your motherboard. In the meantime, if this does not resolve the issue, please reach out again to our team for additional support. Thank you again for reaching out and we apologize for any inconvenience caused.

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

There's something wrong with the connections between the autopilot and the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. If you enable the autopilot, the autopilot will start up the software, but then it will shut down after a short time because the software isn't able to keep up with it. To fix this problem, you'll need to: 1) diagnose the problem and figure out what's causing it; and 2) fix the underlying problem.

Comment

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am having a problem with my boat's Fishfinder. I turned it on, and the software suite (Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite) shut down. I disabled the fishfinder and everything is working fine now. What could be causing this issue?

Comment

There could be a number of reasons why your boat's Fishfinder is shutting down--one possibility is that there is something blocking the unit's communication with the computer. If you're using a custom installation of the software suite, it could be that there are conflicts between the software and the fishfinder hardware. Sometimes damage to thefishfinder unit or improper installation can cause this type of problem. If you're having problems with your Fishfinder one month and then everything works fine the next time you use it, it may be time to take it in for repair or replace it.

Thank you for choosing Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite!

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am having trouble viewing the BlueChart maps. Whenever I open the program, it quickly shuts down. I've tried troubleshooting and closing different windows, but nothing seems to work.

Comment

When this issue begins, be sure that:
1. The latest version of BlueChart is installed on your computer
2. Other mapping software isn't interfering with the installation of BlueChart
3. The USB cable from your camera to the computer is securely plugged in
4. The connection between the camera and the computer is stable - if the map crashes soon after launching, there's a good chance your camera connection is unstable

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

My sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite Application. When I tried to connect it says: "The connection cannot be made because the server administrator has prohibited this type of connection."

Comment

One possible cause could be that the software you're using to access Guidare may not meet the Server Load Balancing (SLB) requirement of your particular hosting service. Additionally, if your DNS configuration prohibits name resolution of the Guidare Server URL, then the connection will fail. You can verify both of these things by checking the event logging on your server for any errors or blocking messages from the connectivity attempts.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:enable the real time tracker
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is freezing the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury On-Board Real-Time Tracker (ORTTS) application routinely experiences system freezes, typically when navigating with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Recognizing a possible software installation issue, users first attempt to resolve the freeze by exitinng and restarting the ORTTSApplication. If this does not work, then disabling and re-enabling the OORTTS may be necessary in order to resume navigation. Disabling ORTTSApplication can be accomplished either by uninstalling it from Mercury, or by passing a command line parameter setting its status to false. Once disabled, users must re-enable ORTTSApplication before using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Comment

One possible software installation issue that may cause system freezes is an inability to load the Mercury On-Board Real-Time Tracker (ORTTS) application. To resolve these freezes, users first MUST exit the ORTTSApplication and restart it. If this does not work, disabling ORTTSApplication may be necessary in order to resume navigation. Disabling ORTTSApplication can be accomplished either by uninstalling it from Mercury, or by passing a command line parameter setting its status to false. Once disabled, users must re-enable ORTTSApplication before using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:disable the wind capture function
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is freezing the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury Herald Hybrid Navigation system includes a wind capture function. This function is designed to help increase the accuracy of the global positioning system (GPS) by estimates of wind speed and direction from data collected by the Mercury's constantly moving global positioning system antennae. The problem is that, sometimes, this function can causes the Mercury's Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application to freeze, preventing users from operating the application. To correct this problem, ensure that the wind capture feature has been disabled in the mercury's navigation system software.

Comment

One possible solution could be for the Mercury Herald Hybrid Navigation system user to disable the wind capture function. To do so, go to System Preferences -> General. On the "Wind Speed" tab, uncheck the box that says "Use acquired winds to calibrate GPS". Then, on the "GPS" tab, make sure that "Use global navigation satellites" is checked and then click on the "Preferences…" button. Finally, in the "Adapter Preferences…" window click on "Enabled Captured Winds".

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, when I try to connect the sonar to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, the application freezes. I have tried deleting and reinstalling the app, but it continues to freeze.

Comment

When you try to connect the sonar, make sure all other applications are closed and that your computer is in standby mode. Next, right-click on the Mercury in My Computer and select Properties. Next, click on the Start tab and click on the Control Panel button. Under Hardware and Sound, click on the Display tab and then select the check box next to Screen savers. Finally, click on theOKbutton. If this does not work, please submit a support request through our website or by calling us at 877-MLTODYS (877-657-6837).

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

This issue can occur if you have upgraded to a newer version of Mercury's Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite (GBNS) whilst your old version is still installed in the system. If this occurs, you may experience problems with the application freezing and not opening. To diagnose and fix the issue, follow these steps:

1. Peform a system hard reboot. This will clear out any temporary files that may be causing the problem and help start your machine fresh.

2. Restore your original GBNS installation from a backup file. If you do not have a backup, contact your dealer.

3. Disable autopilot in GBNS and re-enable it. If autopilot is not currently enabled, enable it through the Options > System Preferences > Navigation menu item.

4. Reload GBNS if prompted to do so.

Comment

This will fix any errors that may be present in the software.


Your machine has upgraded to a newer version of Mercury's Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite (GBNS) whilst your old version is still installed. Unrelated software may have been installed on the same machine at the same time, and this issue can happen when those programs conflict with or override GBNS' settings. The most common scenario for this occurs when you install GBNS updates while your old installation is still installed. Check to see if updates are being installed and uninstall any unrelated software if necessary. Re-install GBNS from a backup if you do not have one, and disable autopilot in GBNS if it is currently enabled and try again. Reload GBNS if prompted.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury On My side Button turns the Blue Screen and Keyboard Off. Feedback indicates that the software should stop freezing when connected through wired network, however, it continues to freeze when using the wifi adapter. Device ID assertion lock screen complaint indicates that Gardare navigating wheel freezes beyond swipe limit as protection mechanism.

Comment

1. Review software to identify where the freezing is occurring. Identifydonald origin issues and make necessary corrections.
2. Implement safeguards to prevent freezing when connected through wired network or when using the wifi adapter. These may include increasing buffer size for graphics and other intensive tasks, or altering coding behavior to decrease input lag.

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am trying to view the BlueChart maps in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application and it is constantly freezing up. I have tried re-installing the application, but the problem persists.

Comment

During testing, it was discovered that the OS X operating system is causing some stability issues with the BlueChart maps. A quick update to the operating system f resolved this problem. A permanent fix is pending Apple approval. Until then, we suggest turning off Add-ons in Safari while using the BlueChart maps.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Boat:Mercury
Version:1

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The application, Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, is freezing when connecting to Sonar. The applicationopens, but quickly freezes and will not let me connect to Sonar. I've tried turning off adifferent device in the house, restarting my computer, and even deleting and reinstalling theapplication. Nothing has worked. I'm lost as to howto fix this.

Comment

It sounds like you might have a problem with your computer installation or internet connection. I recommend you try these techniques to troubleshoot the issue:

1. Make sure that your computer is up-to-date and that all updates are installed.

2. For Office software, check if Publisher or Access is open and if there are any protected files in Silo accessed by either application. Close any other programs on your computer before trying to connect to Sonar. If Publisher or Access are not open and no protected files are found, then forwarding port 443 (HTTPS) to your computer may help. To forward a port: In Windows 7 or Vista – Open UASetup .exe . Select the CA - PC Endpoint server and click Properties . In the Action button list, temporarily click Forward ports . In the pop-up window, type 445 and Service name–Localhost , and then click OK . Point your browser to http://localhost:445 (or whatever your specified port number will be).

3. Try connecting from a different computer if possible. If connecting from another computer does not work, try using an alternate internet connection such as a hotel or airport network that is faster than your home internet connection.

4. If you have an antivirus software installed on your computer, uninstall it and re-install itwihtout any add-on programs such as broadband security or antivirus filtering tools

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:enable the real time tracker
Boat:Mercury

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury OnMyWay Version 7.2.3 TomTom Application and Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is resetting inconsistently when trying to use the "Enable the real time tracker" feature which was added in a recent software update.

Comment

Hello!

We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing issues with your Mercury OnMyWay TomTom Application and Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. We would recommend that you reach out to our technical support team for assistance in troubleshooting this issue. Generally speaking, it is common for updates to the software to cause unintentional resets and therefore we strongly recommend that you wait until a newer software update is available before attempting to enable the real time tracker feature. If you doupdate the software, please be sure to save your current settings first. Thank you for using Mercury OnMyway!

On my Mercury, how do i fix: disable the wind capture function is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

1. Ensure that the Mercury Wind Capture function is properly calibrated and functioning properly.

2. If the Mercury Wind Capture function is not functioning properly, troubleshoot and fix any issues causing the reset.

3. If steps 1 and 2 are unsuccessful, please DM support for further assistance.

Temp:1.2

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting the sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting the sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

You are experiencing an intermittent problem in which your sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Under normal conditions, this should not occur and you may experience intermittent issues with the application. To resolve this issue, you will need to refer to the following:


-Check that the buttons on the sonar are being pressed properly. Verify that all buttons are fully activated. If one or more buttons are inactive, try re-positioning the sonar within its bracket and powering it on again.

-If the buttons are properly activated and still causing issues with the application, ensure that your microphone is properly connected to your sonar unit. If the microphone is unplugged or incorrectly connected, try plugging in the microphone again and clearing any applications or configurations that may be preventing it from functioning correctly.

-Lastly, if all efforts fail to fix the issue and you cannot determine what is causing it, you may need to contact Guidare for assistance.

Comment

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

My mercury guidance boat navigation software suite application is resetting itself everytime I activate the autopilot. Turning off the autopilot fixes the reset problem temporarily but leaves the boat navigable without the assistance of the software suite. Is there a way to make the software permanently inoperative when active?

Comment

There is no permanent fix for this issue. Turning off the autopilot does temporarily solve the problem, but if you desire to rely solely on your instruments, you will need to disable the software suite when active.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, when I enable the fishfinder, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is resetting.

Comment

I was having the same issue you are having. I turned on the fishfinder and sure enough, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application restarted. I uninstalled Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and reinstalled it. This time, it worked fine. I'm not sure what caused the problem before, but perhaps uninstalling and reinstalling made the application default to accepting connections from Mercury Communications Manager instead of the fishfinder.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

My Mercury is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite because I am connecting to the wifi.

Comment

If you are experiencing difficulty connecting your Mercury Marine boat navigation software suite to the internet, there are typically a few methods that can be used to try and fix the issue. Some troubleshooting steps may include:
- powering down everything in the vessel circuitry for ten seconds and then trying to connect again
- unplugging all electronic devices from the system for twenty minutes and then plugging them back in
-always using manual satellite positioning when navigating

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The BlueChart maps in Mercury can occasionally reset the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, which can result in lost progress and diagrams. To resolve this issue, follow these steps:

1. Close all applications that may be affecting the BlueChart software. Mercury GPS may also close while attempting to fix this issue.

2. Quit Mercury GPS completely by clicking on the " ESC " button at the top right of the window. (Mercury GPS will reopen when it is finished.)

3. Go to: C:\Program Files\DirecWay\Mercury WebCom\BoatNavigation Suites\ (If using a 64-bit operating system) or C:\Program Files (x86)\DirecWay\Mercury WebCom\BoatNavigation Suites (If using a 32-bit operating system) and delete the following folder: Bcsu

Comment

ite_Mercury.xml

4. Reload Mercury WebCom from Http://127.0.0.1 with the following command:MercuryWebCom -Reload

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury On-Board Guidance Boat Navigation Suite application which is the cruise control for navigating the boat has a problem which causes the application to reset when connections to Sonar are made. This problem is caused by a bad communication link between the Mercury On-Board Guidance boat Navigation Suite and Sonar.

Comment

A possible resolution to this problem could be to sweep the communications lines between Sonar and Mercury with a capable jamming device in an attempt to break the connection and reset the application. If this fails, then it may be necessary to replace either the Mercury On-Board Guidance Boat Navigation Suite or Sonar.

How do i fix: enable the real time tracker is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enable the real time tracker is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Nothing seems to work. The application quit working randomly. Each time i restart the computer it reverts back to a fresh install of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Whenever i try and open it, it says: Enable the real time tracker Failed to initialize.

Comment

If the issue is just that one application not working correctly, there are a number of things you can try: First, uninstall and reinstall the application. If that doesn't fix the problem, try clearing your browser's cache and cookies. If that still doesn't work, try restarting your computer. And if all of those solutions haven't worked, you may need to contact the developer or manufacturer of the software for further assistance.

Problem

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

It seems that the activation of the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite is resetting it. For example, when I open the application I am told to activate it, but when I click on the activation link it brings me to a page that says the activation has been unsuccessful.

Comment

If you are getting this message, it is likely that your activation link has been clicked on incorrectly or is not working at all. Computer software activation is a complicated process and can sometimes require more than one attempt to activate the software. If you have followed the activation instructions correctly and still cannot activate the software, pleasecontact customer service for help.

Temp:1.2

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: mapping a new route is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: mapping a new route is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When Mapsource Roaming Routes isinstalled on a computer with Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, the following problem can occur: The mappings for the new route are resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. This problem can be corrected by emptying the Trash or Recycle Bin on the computer and then reinstalling Mapsource Roaming Routes.

Comment

Typically when Mapsource Roaming Routes is installed on a computer with Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, the routes will be used as the default route when navigating. If there are multiple routes that should be used as the default, then it is recommend that maps for those other routes should be downloaded and installed on the computer. This problem can be corrected by emptying the Trash or Recycle Bin on the computer and then reinstalling Mapsource Roaming Routes.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is stating that it is connecting to the internal wifi but this is not correct. The issue is causing the software to be reset, which means that all of the saved data is lost.

Comment

One potential cause for the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application stating that it is connecting to the internal wifi, when this is not correct, could be interference from other devices, like wireless links from laptops and phones, interfering with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite's ability to connect to the internal wifi. To try to troubleshoot this issue, one may first attempt to disable all other wireless devices from within the vicinity of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, then try setting up the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite again. If that doesn't help, then it may be helpful to consult with a technician who can help identify and fix any underlying hardware or software issues that may be causing the problem.

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite and while I am working on my bluechart maps, it seems like the viewing mode is resetting to normal view. This could be very annoying if I am trying to figure out a certain area of the map or exactly where something is.

Comment

There is no confirmation if the viewing mode is resetting or if you just unintentionally switched to that view. Try pressing Esc to see a dialog box that tells you how to change the viewing mode.

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Hello everybody,
My name is Jennifer and I am a longtime user of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Problem I am having is this: whenever I try to connect to sonar, the software suite restarts itself. This has been going on for weeks now, and I can’t seem to fix it. Any help would be much appreciated.

Comment

Hello Jennifer,
Thank you for reaching out to us. Can you please provide more information about the problem, such as when it started happening, what you were doing when it restarted, or what you attempted to do afterwards? This will help us better troubleshoot and resolve the issue.

createCase

Boat:Mercury

Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is booting the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Without a troubleshooting procedure to follow, it is difficult to provide an accurate description of the problem. In essence, there may be an incompatibility between some component within the Mercury software and the Guidare Boat Navigation Suite application.

Comment

1. Verify that you have the latest updates for both Mercury software and Guidare Boat Navigation Suite. If there are any updates available, install them.

2. Switch to manual navigation if possible. This will force Mercury to use the onboard hardware for navigation instead of relying on the Guidare Boat Navigation Suite application. See below for more information on this procedure.

3. Verify that all connections between the Mercury software and Guidare Boat Navigation Suite are properly made and secure. For instance, make sure there is enough electrical power being provided to both products, the correct port on your computer is being used, and any peripheral devices (such as cameras or radar) that are connected to the system are working properly.

4. Try restarting both products in question. If the problem persists, try searching online for troubleshooting steps specific to your product in question.
