createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:enabling the autopilot
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is booting the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Kind regards, Anna Davenport.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the autopilot is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have a Mercury Milan with the VGC 5.3 software that I am unable to enabled the autopilot. I have gone through all of the menus and options trying to figure out how to do this but with no luck. When I try to boot the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application the computer starts up and then immediately prompts me to insert the CD that came with the boat. However, when I go to try and install the software it tell me that I already have it installed. The only way for me to fix this is for someone else to take their computer and disable the autopilot for me so that I can load the navigation software suite.

Comment

Hi,

Unfortunately this is a fairly common problem with Mercury Milan boats. The autopilot cannot be enabled in the Voyage Control System (VGC) 5.3 software. There are a couple of ways to try and solve this problem:

1) Disconnect the autopilot cable and see if the computer will load the V GC 5.3 software. If it does not, you may need to uninstall and reinstall the VGC 5.3 software. This can be done via the following steps:
2) Boot the navigation software suite CD and enter the setup application. Under "Tools" on the first screen, click "Options." In the "Option" window that opens, uncheck the checkbox for "Enable autopilot." Click "Okay." If this does not work, you may need to contact Mercury Milan technical support to help you disable or install the autopilot function on your boat.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have a 2009 Mercury Milan V8 with the boat navigation software suite enabled. The issue is that it booting the boat navigation software suite application. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the application, but the problem persists.

Comment

Mercury Marine's boat navigation software suite is a valuable addition to your boating experience. It includes features such as radar and chartplotter navigation, automatic cruise control, collision avoidance and weather information. Booting the application in the 2009 Mercury Milan V8 can be problematic due to possible hardware deficiencies or interference. Mercury may have suggestions on how to troubleshoot or fix theboot failure.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, when I connect to the internal wifi, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application starts. I've tried turning off and on the wifi, resetting the machine, and uninstalling the app, but nothing has worked. Is there something I'm missing?

Comment

There could be a couple things going on. It's possible that your Mercury's wifi settings are configured to allow the Guidare software suite to automatically start when connected. Alternatively, there might be something blocking the software from starting up properly. You might try contacting the software vendor to see if they can help you troubleshoot the issue.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:viewing the BlueChart maps
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix: [KEYWORD] is booting the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Kind regards, Annalee Hoover.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

All of my Mercury computers require that I boot the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application to view BlueChart maps. This problem started after I upgraded my computer's operating system to Windows 10.

Comment

Mercury computers use a system called "guidance points." These points help to orient your current location when viewing charts or navigating. After upgrading to Windows 10, Mercury updated its guidance point software to use a new format that the older Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application did not support. The old software was unable to load the new guidance points, and as a result it may not have been possible to view BlueChart maps on Mercury computers. To workaround this problem, you can boot the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application manually before opening BlueChart maps in order to restore compatibility.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting to sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

My Mercury has a problem connecting to sonar. The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application always boots when I try to connect to sonar.

Comment

There could be several reasons why your Mercury might not be able to connect to sonar. One possibility is that the Mercury's GPS satellite receiver might be malfunctioning. If you believe that this might be the case, you can try augmenting your navigation with other means, such as dead reckoning or heading directly to the destination without using any navigational aids. In some cases, a disconnected or faulty satnav connection might also prevent your Mercury from connecting to sonar. If you have tried all of the above and your Mercury still does not seem to be able to connect, you may need to bring the device in for service.

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am having trouble enabling the real time tracker in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. The application will start up, but the real time tracker icon won't appear in the main window. I've attempted to restart the application and check for updates, but no luck. Please help!

Comment

First make sure you are running the latest version of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. If you are not running the latest version, please click on the "Download Now" button to install the latest update.

If the problem still persists, please try the following steps to enable the real time tracker:


a) Open the Options window in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application and check if there is a box labeled "Use Real Time Tracker" checked. If it is not checked, uncheck the box, hit OK, and then hit Save .

b) Hit Exit from within the Options window.
c) Hit Start from within the Applications Folder .
d) Starting with Windows 8/8.1 and up, Visual Studio 2012 should now start automatically when you launch your computer. If Visual Studio 2012 does not start automatically, go to START > PROGRAMS > MICROSOFT VISUAL STUDIO > VISUAL STUDIO for ARM (or COMMON ).
e) If Visual Studio 2012 still does not start after attempting (d), right-click on anything in your Windows Desktop and select "New Command Window" ). Name it GuidareBCHTaker_ environment variable or something similar (no quotes), reduce its size (Run as Administratorment), and press ENTER ). cd C:\Program Files\Guidare-Boat-Navigation-Software>gm km IEXIT OuspError: [Impunity[OpenCommand IO error - Unable to initialize serial port] : Computer is restarted]]& AnswerMsg=Yes please contact customer service

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Hello,

I am having a problem where the wind capture function within the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application keeps being disabled moments after I boot the application.
The only way to enable the wind capture function once more is to restart the application.

I have searched through the application's codes and can't seem to find a solution.

Any advice would be much appreciated.

Comment




\015\012

If you're encountering intermittent Wind capture failures, it's possible that Windows' user account integrity features are interfering. For instructions on how to test and troubleshoot winlogon event logs, refer to:\015\012 http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/Technet_Library/Event-Logging--Troubleshooting_guide _starting-with-Windows_8#WindowsPrincipals_.22WinLogonStatus.22

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

AUPLOADING PROBLEMS: When I try to activate the vessel identification feature, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application starts up automatically.

Comment

Problem:

One possible reason why you are unable to activate the vessel identification feature is because the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is automatically starting up when you attempt to do so. To stop this process from happening, first make sure that the application icon is not accidentally hidden or inactive and then disable the automatic startup feature by selecting settings from within the application.

How do i fix: changing the maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: changing the maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When I try to change the map in Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, it is booting the application.

Comment

Hi there!

It sounds like you may be encountering an error when trying to change the map in Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. It's possible that your computer is not powerful enough to open the map file on disk. You could try downloading the latest map file onto your computer and opening it in Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Alternatively, you may need to upgrade your computer's graphics card if you are experiencing difficulty opening the map file. If neither of these solutions work please email customer support at support@guidare.com and we'll be happy to help you out. Thanks for using Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite!

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

My sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

It sounds like you may have accidentally launched the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite as your sonar's default application. To prevent this from happening in the future, try launching your sonar from the settings menu instead of through the software. If that doesn't work, consider creating a custom shortcut to the sonar app on your desktop or Start screen.

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I reported this problem in the July feedback form. Whenever I try to enable the fishfinder, it boots up Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. I have tried reinstalling both applications, but neither will work. If I disable the fishfinder, Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite works fine. Please help me fix this mistake!

Comment

Hi there, Glad you contacted us about this problem. We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing difficulty with enabling the fishfinder. Could you please provide more information about the specifics of your issue? Additionally, could you provide a copy of the error message that you're encountering when trying to enable the fishfinder? If possible, could you also include any screenshots or video clips of the error message if possible? Our team is able to better assess your situation and determine a solution as soon as possible. Thank you for reporting this problem and we apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

We are finding that when we try to connect to our internal wifi, the Guidare Boat Navigation Suite application is booted and we can’t use the touchscreen to control the boat. We’ve tried unplugging and re-plugging the router, turning off and on the wifi, restarting both the computer and the router, and even changing the Eve internet setting to “Automatically put devices onhomegroup” with no success. How can we fix this issue?

Comment

When connecting to the router, it’s possible you may not be providing enough horsepower to the router by simultaneously attempting to VPN or use Guidance. Try changing the wifi connection andgg back after verifying the connection. Restarting the PC and router should also resolve the issue if their are artifacts present on devices startup ( Navigate, Initialization time is too long etc) that would cause GUI/app overwhelm or disabled Services.

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

It seems that when connecting to Sonar, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is starting up. I've tried disabling and re-enabling sonar, but it doesn't seem to help.

Comment

There could be a number of reasons for why your computer is acting as if it is trying to start up the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Some possible causes could be:1) You have an outdated version of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application installed on your computer. Try downloading and running the most recent version of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application from our website.2) Your computer'sbumper or network ports are not properly configured. Formatting yourhard drive, sealing off air vents, and updatingyour network drivers could all help improvel performance when accessing webpages andservers.3) You may be trying to access the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suiteapplication from an un- securedconnection. Using a secureconnection (e.g.: using https:// inurl:port instead of just inurl: ) will encryptyour communication, making it more difficultfor somebody else to intercept and maliciouslychange your data while it is travelling acrossthe internet.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: activating the vessel identification is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Dear Technical Support,

My Mercury Catalyst have been experiencing an activation of the vessel identification is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite Application error. I have tried resetting my device, reinstalling the application,, connecting to Wifi and restarting my Mercury, but to no avail. Can you elaborate on how I can fix this issue?

Thank you for your time,

Ariah Ortega

Comment



From: Persistent Technical Support Department [mailto:support@mercurycatalyst.com]

Sent: Wednesday, October 10, 2016 5:17 PM

Subject: Activation of the vessel identification is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite Application error.

Hi there!
If you're experiencing an activation of the vessel identification is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite Application error on your Mercury Catalyst, here's what might be causing it. First, make sure your Mercury Catalyst is connected to the internet and that the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is activated (see troubleshooting guide below for more information). Second, if you're using a Google account with Mercury Catalyst, make sure that your browser settings are correct and that you're not blocking access to the Mercury Catalyst website by disabling cookies or other cautious measures. Lastly, try resetting your Mercury Catalyst device (see our troubleshooting guide below for instructions) and reinstalling the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

If none of these solutions work resolve the issue, please reach out to Mercury for further assistance. Thank you for your time.

Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have a Mercuryigr on which the sonar connecting erroring means that the guidance boat navigation software suite (GBNS) application does not work properly.

Comment

There are likely several factors involved in the sonar connection error, which often require more than a simple solution. First and foremost, it is vital that you determine if the sonar system is indeed failing. If this is the case, a technician may need to be contacted in order to repair or replace the unit. If the failure is within GBNS, there are typically fixes available that do not require a technician's intervention. Often copying and pasting certain portions of the navigation data into a new workspace will help reconnect the software. Finally, it is possible that your hardware may simply need adjustments or . Regardless of the cause, our team can help troubleshoot and resolve any issues with your GBNS software

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury Invalid input for VIN number communication error occurs when I try to enable the fishfinder in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite app.

Comment

The problem may be related to incorrect VIN number entered in your mobile device's app. There are a few things you can do to troubleshoot the issue:
-Make sure that the VIN number is correct and entered in the correct location on your mobile device.
-Verify that there are no security and/or backup measures blocking communication with Mercury Accessories or our system. These measures may include turning off your wi-fi, Bluetooth, or GPS; erasing all local data files; and/or disablingappy features. Disabled features may include Sounds & vibrations, Traffic & weather, and Screen lock items on specific iOS devices.
If these remedies do not resolve the issue, please Contact Mercury Product Support for assistance.

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

- I downloaded the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite onto my computer and activated it. However, when i try to use it, the activation message keeps popping up indicating that the vessel identification iserroring the application. What can I do to fix this?

Comment

If you are using the latest version of Guidare Boat Navigation, disable any cookies or antivirus software that may interfere with our activation process. Please follow these steps to disable cookies: - In a web browser, go to "Settings" - In the "General" section, click on "History" - Click on "Delete all history..." You can also disable antivirus software by going to "Settings" -> "Privacy and Security" -> "Tools." Follow the instructions provided by your antivirus software. If you have tried both of these methods and you are still experiencing difficulty activating the software, please CONTACT US.

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: changing the maps is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Your software known as the Guidare Boat Navigation Suite application is constantly crashing when trying to change the maps screen. This problem has been occurring for a long time now and it's preventing you from fixing other errors with your software. The crashes are happening when you try to click on the "Change Maps" button. The software instantly freezes and Reboots. Even undoing changes doesn't work because of these crashes.

Comment

The problem could be due to any number of reasons, but probably the most likely is that there is a bug in your software that can't be fixed. Your best bet is to try and find the source of the crashes and fix it. You may also want to consider looking for another software to help with your navigation if this isn't an option.

Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: mapping a new route is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: mapping a new route is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

My computer is suddenly randomly crashing when I try to map a new route. The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application keeps saying that the mapping process has failed and to check if there are any new updates available.

Comment

During the mapping process, your computer becomes unstable and crashes as you are trying to enter the coordinates into the software. When this occurs, there are usually either new updates for the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application or specific configuration issues with your computer that need to be resolved in order for the mapping process to successfully continue.

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Hello, I managed to get my sonar connecting to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application but whenever I try and use it the connection is erroring. It seems to me like there might be something wrong with the Bluetooth connection? Any help would be much appreciated!

Comment

Hi there,abling Bluetooth usually requires your device and the device you're trying to connect wirelessly to be on the same network. And make sure your device is properly seated in the software - sometimes devices slip out of slots or whenč uds are jostled...all of which can result in Bluetooth not working properly. For optimal performance, you might also want to connect your Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite to a power outlet.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The autopilot function in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is erroring when enabled. This results in the user not being able to enter or editboat positions or routes.

Comment

When you enable the autopilot function in Guidare Boat Navigation software suite, you must ensure that all of the system settings are compatible with your use of the autopilot. The most common error points for this are:
- Check that your boat’s trim is set toPORTAGE and not ALL_OREGON, as this will disable the autopilot.
- Make sure your satellite configuration is correct, as incorrect settings can also interfere with autopilot operation.
Once you have corrected any associated system settings, you can re-enable the autopilot by clicking on the APPLY button in the AUTOPILOT SETTINGS menu, or by selecting OPTIONS > AUTOPILOT from the GUIDARE menubar. If the autopilot still fails to operate properly, please contact oursupport team for assistance.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The "Enabling the Fishfinder is Erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite Application" problem occurs when you try to open the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite after upgrading from an earlier version of the software. The error message says: "The enabling the fishfinder problem occurred. If you continue, the application may not function properly." To fix this problem, follow these steps:

1.) Starting with Windows 8, go to Start and search for "Settings." Click on "Control Panel" in the results that appear, and then click on "Mouse and Keyboard."
2.) Under the heading "Mouse," click on "Advanced" and then under the heading "Pointer Options," make sure that "Enable ancillary mouse services" is unchecked.
3.) Restart your computer. After your machine restarts, open the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite again and your problem should be resolved.

Comment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am trying to connect to the internal wifi on my laptop but it is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. It's been doing this for a while now and I'm not sure what to do about it!

Comment

First, make sure that you have the latest drivers installed for your device. Some laptops may require them be updated using the Device Manager. If that doesn't work, you may need to update your software program. Another possibility is that your router or modem is not yet DHCP enabled and unable to provide a valid IP address to your laptop. You can try asking your ISP to set up a router for you or you can install a standalone router. There are also methods for fixing this issue by re-adding the laptop profile to the wifi networkspot and register the applications on their website

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

There seems to be an issue with how the BlueChart maps are loading in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. When trying to view the maps, I'm getting an error message that says " viewing the BlueChart maps is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application." The only solution I've been able to find is to completely uninstall and reinstall the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Can somebody please help me figure out what's causing this problem and how to fix it?

Comment

There could be a number of reasons why your BlueChart map may not be loading in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Removing and reinstalling the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application may fix the issue, but it is also possible that another piece of software is interfering with the BlueChart map installation. If you are unable to resolve the problem through troubleshooting, please contact the customer service team for the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application for more assistance.

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The application (Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite) is reporting an error when attempting to connect to sonar. Detailed information on the error is below:

- "Sonar connection failed."

- "The sonar server could not be contacted."

Comment



Please provide steps for resolving the error.

Incorrect Network Address



One possible reason the application is reporting an error connecting to sonar could be because the network address is incorrect. The application may need to be configured to use the correct address in order to connect.

Problem

I need a fix for the device is stuck on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

Comment

Hi there! The issue could be rooted in either a device issue or an issue on the employer’s end. It’s possible that there is an error with the code you entered, or it might not be valid. If you think you have accidentally provided an invalid code or if you can provide us with additional information linking the problem to your software, we’d be happy to help. Otherwise, our advice would be to contact your employer for support in resolving the issue. Thank you for your inquiry.

Title Sentence:I need a fix for [KEYWORD] on my [PRODUCT].

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

I need a fix for i have a blank screen on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for i have a blank screen on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

I have a blank screen on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. I installed the software a few days ago, but now it won't open at all. I tried entering my password, but nothing happens. What can I do to solve this problem?

Comment

There could be several reasons why your Guidare Boat Navios Software would not open:
-One possibility is that the software was automatically shut down because of a memory or disk problem. To fix this, you may need to repair or reinstall the software.
-Another possible reason is that you did not activate the software when you installed it. To activate the software, follow these steps: 1. In Windows Explorer, go to the following folder: C:\Program Files\Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite\ 2. Double-click on Guidare Boat Navios Setup.exe 3. On the License Agreement screen, make sure that “I accept the terms of the License Agreement” is selected and click Next 4. On the Creating Folder screen, provide a name for your folder (such as "G boat") and click Next 5. On the Folder Creation Completed screen, click Finish 6. If prompted to create a Shortcut on your Desktop, click Yes Note: You will need to enter your Login Name and Password when prompted to do so.
If none of these solutions work then please feel free to contact oursupport team at help@uic Masters & Scholars online forum

I need a fix for there is a blinking red led on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

Comment

The blinking red Led could mean a few things. If it is the software installation, then you may need to uninstall and reinstall the software in order for it to work correctly. If it is an firmware issue, you may need to update your computer's firmware.

I need a fix for the progress bar keeps spinning on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for the progress bar keeps spinning on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

The progress bar on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite keeps spinning, preventing me from being able to use the software.

Comment

I'm sorry to hear that your Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is not functioning properly. Typically, if the progress bar is spinning rapidly, it could be caused by one of two things: either the software is incompatible with your computer or there may be a problem with the installation disc. If the problem does not seem to be related to the software itself, then it might be worth trying to reset your computer or reformat your hard drive. If you still can't solve the issue, please let us know and we'll do whatever we can to help get you set up again.

Problem

I need a fix for the map is not being displayed on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

The map is not displaying properly on my Guidare boat navigation software suite. There seems to be a problem with the wiring of the GPS unit in relation to the software.

Comment

Your boat navigation software contains very specific wiring requirements in order for the unit to be correctly connected. Unfortunately, your GPS unit may not be compatible with this type of wiring or configuration. You may need to take your GPS unit into a repair shop in order to have it properly configured and tested in order to get it working on your boat navigation software.

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for there is no connection to the sensors on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

I'm having trouble connecting to the sensors on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Ive tried restarting the software, rebooting my computer, and even weeks of uninstalling and reinstalling the software. Nothing is fixing the connection issue.

Comment

Solution 1: Verify and make sure your internet connection is stable. The sensor data for the Guidare Boat Navigation software might take a long time to download, depending on your internet speed.

Solution 2: Try updating the Guidare Boat Navigation software to the latest version. This can fix someConnection issues.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

I need a fix for cannot connect other devices on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Symptoms

I have a Guidare Boat Navigation software suite and I cannot connect my other devices to it.

Comment

Depending on your device and Guidare Boat Navigation software suite version, there could be a number of reasons why you cannot connect your other devices to your Guidare Boat Navigation software suite. One possible reason is that you might not have installed the Guidare Boat Navigation app onto your other devices. If you have not installed the app then you can download it from the App Store or Google Play Store and install it onto your other devices. If you have alreadyinstalled the app and are still having difficulties connecting your other devices, please contact customer support for assistance.

Additionally, it may take some time for the software to establish a connection. In most cases, if the issue persists then it is advisable to contact the software manufacturer for assistance.

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, the device is stuck.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, the device is stuck.

Symptoms

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, the device is stuck. When trying to start the device, like pressing the power button or pressing and holding reset button for 10 seconds, nothing happens. The only way to get the device to work again is to remove the battery and reinsert it.

Comment

Hello,

Thank you for filing a problem with Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. We would love to help troubleshoot and hopefully resolve the issue. Could you please email us at support@guidareboat.com with a little more information? Specifically, could you send us the exact steps you took to try to start the device and if there was any activity on the display prior to it not booting up? Additionally, could you describe what went wrong when trying to use the product? Please includeedience error messages if possible. Lastly, did you remove and re-insert the battery before submitting your ticket? These are all important details in order for us to help troubleshoot the issue. We appreciate your cooperation in this matter.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, i have a blank screen.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, i have a blank screen.

Symptoms

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite will not open on my Mercury.

Comment

Hello,
If you are seeing that the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is not opening when you try to open it as an administrator on your Mercury computer system, then one common cause is that you do not have the latest application intelligence (AI) security patch installed. You can download and install the latest software AI patch from our website at:
http://www.guidare.com/m2-amcah-api-security-patch/. If after installing the software AI patch and attempting to launch the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite again you still experience this issue, please let us know so that we can further investigate.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:there is a blinking red led
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:When using the product [PRODUCT] on my [BOAT], [KEYWORD].
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, there is a blinking red led.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, there is a blinking red led.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, there is a blinking red led.

Symptoms

The software Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite detects that the Mercury is leaving its dock and guides you back to dock. However, if you are farther away from your dock than the software thinks you are, the Mercury will blink red until it reaches the dock.

Comment

When docking your boat, always verify the actual location of your boat vs. where the software thinks it is by crossing the finish line of your dock. If you are consistently off by a distance that exceeds what the software assumes your boat is located at, then one of two things may need to be done: increase distance calibration for the software or purchase an ultrasonic rangefinder for accurate distance measurement in open water.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, cannot connect to Panoptix device.

Symptoms

When I try to connect my Mercury to the Panoptix device, I get a message saying that there is not a network connection available.

Comment

First, ensure that both your Mercury and Panoptix device are connected to the same Wi-Fi network. If you are experiencing this problem on a Mercury tablet, ensure that it is properly registered with your Panoptix account. If you continue to have difficulty connecting, please follow the troubleshooting tips below.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, cannot connect other devices.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, cannot connect other devices.

Symptoms

When I attempt to connect my Mercury Observer 145 FlashDrive to the onboard computer of Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite to download map updates or to see real-time marine weather, I get an error message that he software cannot connect to the Mercury.

Comment

The issue may be due to the requirement that your Mercury observer software be upgraded to includewebkit support. You can check for this by going to:
enter: "/online/ mercury-observer" on the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite's "Online Interface" entry screen.
If the output says: "Websocket Support Not Available On This Device," then you likely need to upgrade your Mercury observations software.

Temp:1.2
Length:500

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, cannot connect to built in wifi.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

When using the product Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Mercury, cannot connect to built in wifi.

Symptoms

There is a problem when trying to connect to the built in wifi on my Mercury.

Comment

There could be a problem with the SSID (Service Set Identifier) or password on your Mercury - try adbstaafl to reset them:

adbstaafl network Reset by entering network ssid, eg "adsl-NETWORK-1" at command prompt

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Disabled wind capture will cause the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application to disable, sometimes resulting in the inability to return control to the user

Sometimes when using the Mercury Onboard Fishing Package, the wind capture function can become disabled. If this happens, it will affect the operation of the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite. In order to fix this problem, you will need to open the Mercury Onboard Fishing Package, disable wind capture, and then restart the package.

Comment

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

In order to use the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, your Mercury must first activate the vessel identification feature. However, occasionally this feature will shut down, resulting in the software not being able to be used. Symptom: The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application will not activate and continually displays "Activating Vessel Identification Failed".

Corvette Solution:
1. Verify that the vessel identification feature is activated on your Mercury by searching for it under Settings>Victim Computer Features. If activation is successful, then troubleshoot any residual issues preventing the software from running properly.

2. If dec activation is unsuccessful, uninstall and reinstall the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite from its original installation location (usually C:Program FilesIntuitGuidareBoatNavigationS). Be sure to restart your computer after installation.

3. If res still fails, remove all Intuit applications from your computer and reinstall only the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Comment

Also, check for any new updates for the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite since this may resolve some issues.

In the meantime, we recommend that youuntsideourdatabaseandmakeanynecessarymwichangesafeprior to using the software.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Your Mercury is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application to route a new route.

Comment

There could be a number of reasons for your Mercury shutting down the application. One possibility is that it is no longer able to connect to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite server. Another possibility is that there is an issue with the application itself. If you are unable to logs into the application or if there are reports of error messages, then you may need to repair or update the software suite.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

There seems to be a problem connecting the sonar on my model of Mercury. The GUidare Boat Navigation Software Suite stopped working and I can't seem to find a way to fix it.

Comment

Hello,
The issue could be with the damaged or malfunctioning sonar on your Mercury model, which need repairing/replacing. Additionally, you can try resetting the device by disconnecting it from power for a few minutes and reconnecting it. Other ways to fix this issue might include performing a software update or reformatting the disk drive. For long-term stability and user convenience, you may want to consider installing a fresh copy of the GUidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Otherwise, please let us know at support@guidare.com if we can help in any other way!

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

One possible issue with the Mercury Fishfinder is that it can disable the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suiteapplication. To fix this, follow these steps:

01) First, establish whether or not the Mercury Fishfinder is actually shutting down the Guidare Boat NavigationSoftware Suiteapplication. To do this, try accessing the application through the Start Menu and Log On to your Mercury Fishfinderprofile. If you are prompted to enter an administrative password,timeout The fishfinder service, or restart your machine, then you likely have a problem with the Fishfinderparameter settings.>>>
If you are not prompted to enter an administrative password, timeoutThe fishfinder service, or restart your machine, then either 1) the Fishfinder parameter settings are not enabled in your Mercury profile or
2) there is something blocking access to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suiteapplication. For step two, consider whether or not somebody elseon your network has installed software that could be blocking access tothe Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suiteapplication folder on your Mercuryfishfinder storage drive. Once you have narrowed down the potentialproblemerson your network, take actionlisted below.:

02) If someone on your network has installedsoftware that could be blocking access tothe Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suiteapplication folder on your Mercuryfishfinder storage drive andyou havethen taken actionlisted below.,

Comment

remove the software andtryagain toaccess the application.

03) If you have established there is a problem withthe Mercury Fishfinderand cannotaccess the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suiteapplication, then you should attempt to reset your Fishfinder. To do this,follow these steps:

1) Open the Start Menu and Log On to your MercuryFishfinderprofile.
2) Click on “Settings” in the menu bar at the top of the screen. (Ordouble-click on the mercury tray icon on your taskbar if it is minimized)
3) On the “Main Settings” tab, click on the “Fishfinder” icon.
4) In “Settings for Fish Finder” window, under “Settings Alergy Profile,” select
the option called “clear content and rescanfishfinderstoragelocation.” This step willclean and rescan your Mercury Fishfinder storage location, so thatyou will have fresh data to work with when troubleshooting anyissues with the Fishfinder application.>>

The Mercury Fishfinder can disable the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application if its parameters are not enabled in your profile. To fix this, follow these steps:1)Open the Start Menu and Log On to your MercuryFishfinderprofile2)Click on “Settings” in the menu bar at the top of the screen3)On the “Main Settings” tab, click on the “Fishfinder” icon4)In “Settings for Fish Finder” window, under “Settings Alergy Profile,' select 'the option called 'clear content and rescanfishfinderstoragelocation.' This step willclean and rescan your Mercury Fishfinder storage location, so thatyou will have fresh data to work with when troubleshooting anyissues with theor Fishfinder application.

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury OnStar communications software module can interfere with the functionality of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. In some cases, this interference has caused the BlueChart maps application to shutdown automatically. To resolve the problem, follow these steps:

Comment

1. Exit the Mercury OnStar communications software module and reinstall it.

2. Disable required components of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application by dragging them to the "Undo" column in the Window menu and clicking "Apply."

3. Restart the BlueChart maps application.

However, if that fails, you may need to go in through your computer's diagnostics to assess the connection. Else, someone more knowledgeable about Mercury navigation may be needed in order to properly diagnose the problem.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is shutting down because the wind capture function is disabled. To fix this problem, enable the wind capture function.

Comment

A possible solution for this problem could be to enable the wind capture function on the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. This can be done by opening the application and clicking on the Settings tab. From here, users can switch on the wind capture function. Hopefully, with this change, the navigation software will stay running for longer periods of time.

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

An activation error message pops up stating "Activating Vessel Identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application."

This seems to be caused by a missing font file (.ttf) on the user's computer. The fix is simple: locate the font file and copy it to the vessel identification folder. Then try activating the vessel identification again.

Comment

Problem

How do i fix: mapping a new route is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Comment

Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing problems with the existing boat navigation software. This might be due to the new application that was installed on your computer. It is possible to disable or uninstall the new application in order to restore compatibility with the old boat navigation software. If disabling or uninstalling the new application does not work, we may need to provide a temporary workaround which involves disabling some of the other features of the new application. Please feel free to let us know if you have any questions or concerns and we would be happy to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience and cooperation during this time.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

User guide says: "To Enabling Autopilot:
1. Open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application and locate the 'Settings' button on the top toolbar.
2. Click on the 'Settings' button to open the application's settings window.
3. Uncheck the 'Enable Autopilot' checkbox and click on the 'Approve Changes' button to save your changes.
4. Restart your computer to apply these changes."
User Guide states that if you change anything on "Settings" tab, autopilot will shut down software suite immediately, whether or not user approves changes. How can this be resolved so that Navigation Software Suite continues to run regardless if autopilot is enabled or not?- Error Message box in Settings window when trying to approve changes says "Error approving changes - Operation couldnt be completed because an unknown error occured."

Comment

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The fishfinder is enabled and shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

According to the manufacturer, this issue may occur when "The fishfinder is enabled and shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application." Turning off the fishfinder to prevent it from taking away processing power from the software suite may solve this problem.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am getting an error message when I try to connect to the internal wifi on my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite account. It says that the connection is shutting down the application. What can I do to fix this?

Comment

If you are getting an error message when you try to connect to your Accord Boat Navigation software, there could be a few things that could be causing the problem. Causes of this type of error can include:

-A recent software or hardware change that has disrupted the signals between your computer and the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
-A possible issue with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite itself
-Communication issues between your computer and the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:viewing the BlueChart maps
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:How do i fix: [KEYWORD] is shutting down the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have ran into an issue where when I attempt to view the BlueChart maps, it unexpectedly stops my Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application from running. I am unable to restart the application, or even turn off my computer. Has anyone encountered this issue before and been able to resolutions?

Comment

Hi there,Since you report the problem as pertaining to BlueChart on your computer, and not another software that you might be using concurrently, it seems very likely you have an issue with BlueChart or Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Both applications use the Windows SideShow graphics drivers to render maps on your desktop, so if one is malfunctioning for some reason and is prevent inge computer from doing its usual stuff like starting up services or applications then the other also may not start. In my experience restarting a computer often cures these types of blue-screen errors, but is not always guaranteed.If that doesn't do the trick - or if you’re comfortable taking additional measures - you may opt to uninstall BlueChart entirely and try reinstalling it later; though this is an inconvenient solution and can render your map data unusable.Hope this helps resolve your issue!

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am having issues connecting to the sonar: shutting down the Boat Navigation Suite application. I have powered off and on my modem, reinstalled the software, reset my modem and router, reset my Windows 10 PC - everything points to a connection problem. Can you help?

Comment

Ubuntu Linux is missing the sonar package: you will need to install the sonar package from the Ubuntu software store. You can also use this command to see if there is a package installed for sonar : $ pkg find sonar If you do not have the apt install program on your computer, then you can install it with this command: sudo apt-get install apt-essential Once you have installed the package, check to see if it is working by typing the following command: $ sonar -V The output should show that the sonar process is running.

Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I'm having problems with the Mercury doing anything in the boating area such as disabling the wind capture function. It freezes the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application every time I try to work with it which makes it totally unusable.

Comment

The Mercury does have a wind capture function, but it might be disabled on your unit or fuzzy in operation. Try the following to reset the Mercury and enable the wind capture function: Â 1) Click the Menu button, then press Track and Data Settings. Â 2) Once in track and data settings, click Cruise Lines and services & digitals (rightmost column). Â 3) Next to Mercury wind vane disable switch in red (at upper right), click to turn off the LED indicator light. Â 4) Return to harbornav, track and data settings and press Digitals > Mariner Electronics Wind Systems (L-R) Onshore Â Advisor Software > Enable Wind Capture Legacy. Â 5) Go back to Cruise Lines & services & digitals (rightmost column)and turn on the Mercury wind vane disable switch in blue.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix changing the maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix changing the maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The problem description is as follows:

On my Mercury, when I try to change the maps using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, the application sometimes Freezes and I have to hard-reset my phone in order to use it again. This issue has been going on for a while, and I'm getting really frustrated with it. Ideally, I'd like to be able to just change the maps without having to go through all of this hassle.Anyone know of a solution?

Comment



Mercury computers, specifically the models from 2006-2007, apparently have a problem where systems can become unstable if you map changes are made directly through the Guides Boat Navigation Software Suite application. This can often necessitate a hard reset in order to use the operating system again. Please note that this is an affliction largely limited to these old computer models; most newer Mercurys do not suffer from similar software issues. Unfortunately, there is currently no known workaround to resolve this problem.




This is likely just a glitch in the software and should be fixed soon. There is no need to go through such a hassle of hard resetting your phone. If the issue persists, please reach out to customer service for further assistance.

Learn more about Kerberos authentication and how to troubleshoot problematic authorization requests.

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

There is a problem with the mapping software in your Mercury that is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. The problem can be caused by a corrupted or missing map file or the malfunction of your GPS receiver. The best way to fix this problem is to delete the frozen applicationprofile and start fresh by downloading and installing the latest map file. If that doesn't work, then you may need to contactsamsung at support.com for assistance.

Comment

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We have investigated and determined that the cause of the problem is a corrupted map file. To try andfix the issue we recommend downloading and installingas latest map file. If that doesn't work, then you may need to contactsamsung at support.com for assistance.

Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

What steps will you take to try and fix the problem?

1. On your Mercury, go to "Settings" and then click on "General."

2. Under the "Device Information" heading, locate "Network Connections."
2a. If there is no red error symbol next to the "Connected to Network" label, then your Mercury has an active wired or wireless connection. If there is a red error symbol next to the "Connected to Network" label, then your Mercury does not have an active wired or wireless connection. NOTE: If your Mercury does not have an active wired or wireless connection, you can still use the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite by connecting your Mercury to a USB port on your computer.

3. In the "Network Connections" window, double-click on the connection that you want to troubleshoot. (For example, if you are trying to connect to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite online service, double-click on "MyUSBServer.")
4. If you are able to log in to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, follow these steps: a) Click on the login screen that pops up.
b) In the username field, type in your Mercury username and password. c) In the application field, type in GUIDAR_Boat_Navigation_Suite and hit Enter. NOTE: You can find out your Mercury username and password by going to [Driver Name] | [Account Name] | [Login ID number].

Comment

If you can't log in, please enter the support contact information for your Mercury in the "Additional Comments" field below and we will try to assist you.
5. If you are not able to log in to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, follow these steps: a) Click on the "Help" menu item in the application window.
b) Under "Troubleshooting Tips," click on " Diagnosing Configuration Problems ."
c) If you are using a Wi-Fi network and Unable to Reconnect to Network is displayed as an error message, try reconnecting your Mercury to your home or office Wi-Fi network.

1. If your Mercury does not have an active wired or wireless connection, you can still use the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite by connecting your Mercury to a USB port on your computer.

2. In the "Network Connections" window, double-click on the connection that you want to troubleshoot. (For example, if you are trying to connect to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite online service, double-click on "MyUSBServer.")

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

There is no one-size-fits-all answer to this problem, as the best solution will depend on the specific combination of hardware and software that is installed on your Mercury. However, some possible solutions include:

1) Make sure that the Mercury is properly connected to the internet and that all of the software updates are up to date.

2) Try reinstalling the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. This should resolve any issues with freezing or slowdowns.

3) If these measures fail to solve the issue, maybe there is something wrong with your Mercury's hardware configuration or operating system. In this case, it may be necessary to seek help from a friend or tech expert who can help you fix the problem.

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have a 2007 Mercury Mountaineer. When I try to connect to sonar ( Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite ), it freezes the application. I have tried reinstalling the software, but it doesn't seem to help. What can I do?

Comment

There could be a number of reasons why the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application on your 2007 Mercury Mountaineer freezes, but most likely the culprit is an error with the files in the application's folder. Try this troubleshooting procedure to resolve the issue:


• First, make sure that all of the files and folders within the application's folder are properly scanned for viruses using your antivirus software.

• Next, consult your user guide to ensure that all of the related software and hardware drivers are installed and configured correctly.

• Finally, try contacting Guidare customer support for assistance.

createCase

Title Sentence:How do i fix: [KEYWORD] is freezing the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: How do i fix: connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The sonar (directional audio sounder) is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

Dear Customer,
Welcome to the Live Support! My name is Paolo and I'll be glad to help you with this issue.
First of all, please check if your computer meets the minimum requirements for running our Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. If not, please let us know and we'll directly provide you with the recommended specs.
Below are listed some possible reasons why the sonar (directional audio sounder) might be freezing the application:
- Improper speakers or microphone sensitivity settings;
- Virus infection on your computer;
- Malfunctioning hardware in the sonar;
- Freeware or pirated software causing instability and corruption in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application ;
- Unsufficient system resources (RAM and CPU usage) - do your PC benchmarks score more than 2500 ~ 3500 on average? Then there may not be enough free memory and/or processing power available for the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application to perform optimally.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Whenever the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite program is enabled, it will freeze up. When the user tries to disable the autopilot, it freezes up their computer. There is no way to power off the autopilot- it's just stuck on. We've tried everything from uninstalling and reinstalling the software to restarting our computer- nothing works. Any ideas on what we can do?

Comment

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite might be inadvertently causing issues with your computer by constantly running in the background. If you're experiencing common freezes or inability to disable/power off the autopilot, it might be time to disable this feature in the software and see if that resolves the issue. Additionally, there is a chance that a recent software update caused these issues, in which case updating the software may help.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Keyword:connecting to the internal wifi
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:How do i fix: [KEYWORD] is freezing the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The user has been experiencing problems connecting to their internal wifi. When connecting, the software suite is freezing.

Comment

Based on the symptoms, it is likely that the user's wifi configuration is not correct. There are a few things that can cause this, including:

-Wrong SSID: The user's wifi must have a unique SSIDname in order to be detected by the software suite. If they are using a public hotspot, they may need to re-configure their wifi to have a custom SSIDname.

-Wireless network not secured: The user's wifi must be configured with a security setting allowing access from only specified devices (smartphones, tablets, etc). If the network does not have such protection, laptops and other portable devices could be connecting without permission.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The user is freezing the BlueChart Map display when attempting to view a map. The application is not responding to any keys or mouse input.

Comment

First, check to see if the computer is sitting idle for a long period of time. If it is, then the computer may be trying to "sleep." This will prevent the computer from responding to User Input, including mouse and keyboard. Another possible cause is that weak or lacking internet connection can cause issues with BlueChart Map. Try connecting to a stronger Wi-Fi or cellular network in your area and again, testing out the BlueChart Map function. If all else fails, please submit a ticket for support.

Hello,

Thank you for your email and accompany problem report. I am sorry to hear that you are experiencing connectivity issues with Sonar. It sounds like something may be blocking the connection between Sonar and your computer, which can be complicated to diagnose and may require a technician from Sonar's support team to resolve. Do you have any other ideas about what might be causing the issue? If not, please let us know and we would be happy to help troubleshoot further for you.Thanks!

To fix this issue, try reinstalling the application. If that does not fix the problem, you can try resetting your Mercury computer by unplugging all cables and restarting it.
