You could try reinstalling the software, though that might not work if it's causing the shutdown problem. Another possibility is that you need to change a setting in the software in order to avoid the shutdowns. The user guide hints provided may help you identify and fix the issue.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

A customer on a 2011 Mercury Montego reported that the sonar navigation application, Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, was shutting down intermittently. After unsuccessful attempts to find a solution online, the customer contacted Mercury Hello. A support representative determined that the problem was with the cable connecting the sonar unit to Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. The support representative recommended that the customer disconnect and reconnect the cable several times in sequence to resolve the issue.

Comment

We are glad to hear that your Mercury Montego is up and running smoothly again! Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. We would advise disconnecting and reconnecting the cable several times in sequence to correct any connection issues. If that fails, please reach out to our support team for further assistance. Have a great day!

createCase

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

1. On the Mercury, how do you enable the autopilot?
2. When using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, the autopilot is shutting down frequently. What can be done to fix this?

Comment

1. Enabling the autopilot on the Mercury is simple: a push button located below the steering wheel enables the onboard computer to control steering and speed.
2. When using Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, it's possible that the autopilot is unintentionally shutting down. In order to fix this, some users have had success manually checking off the "Enable Autopilot" box in the Navigation menu bar - though this may not solve all issues.

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Your Mercury OSMO software suite is shutting down when attempting to enable the fishfinder. 1. Verify that your software suite is up-to-date. 2. Verify that you're using the correct driver for your fishfinder. 3. Verify that you're connected to the Internet and having access to the Mercury OSMO software suite support website. 4. Check for any interfering software or hardware installed on your computer or device that may be affecting the function of the fishfinder or Mercury OSMO software suite. 5. Uninstall any third-party applications that may be inhibiting or interfering with the proper functioning of your Mercury OSMO software suite. 6. Clear your computer's cache and temporary files to improve system performance. 7. Reset your computer's anti-virus software and firewall settings to deter potential intrusions or interruptions from outside sources that may be impairing the functionality of your Mercury OSMO software suite.

Comment

8. Contact Mercury OSMO support if the above recommendations do not resolve the issue.

Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Facility Manager: On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application?



The issue begins when users attempt to use the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite applications to connect to the facility's internal wifi. Initially, users may be able to successfully connect to the wifi; however, as time progresses, the application will begin to close automatically, regardless of whether or not any operations have been completed. This issue often occurs after a malware attack or other interference that may have damaged or disrupted the facility's networking hardware. To resolve the issue, administrators can try to isolate and repair damage to the networking gear, or upgrade their software and/or hardware solutions.

Comment

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When attempting to access or use any of the BlueChart Maps suites maps on a Mercury, the Guidare Boat Navigation software suite crashes and eventually shuts down. This can often be remedied by either uninstalling and reinstalling the Guida software suite, or by accessing bluechart update software activity in Mercury Control Center -> System Settings -> Software Update.

Comment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:How do i fix: [KEYWORD] is shutting down the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The wind capture function is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

The wind capture function is designed to help Punisher naval boats increase accuracy when sailing in the wind by capturing data from the boat's sailing instruments and sharing that information with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. When this function is enabled, it can take up to 3 minutes for it to collect data and sync with the software suite. If this process is happening while the boat is moving, it can cause interference with the navigation system and might harm the boat. If you are experiencing problems with the wind capture function, please disable it and see if that resolves the issue.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: activating the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

activate the vessel identification is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Software suite application: Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
The problemy occurs when a user tries to open the application, but the activation message pops up following initial startup of the software.
Workaround- Disable automatic activation and try opening the software manually
When the software starts up ('Activating...'), it prompts the user to activate it with a verification code that was sent to them when they bought the software (e.g., via an email). If a user doesn't have that code, they may be able to disable automatic activation by going to 'Settings'--->'General'--->'Software Activation':
- In 'Activating...', uncheck the box next to 'Use automatic activation'.
- Click on 'Set forced activation password' and type in a new password (something easy for you to remember).
- When you're finished, click 'Ok'.
Now you can open the software whenever you want, by simply clicking its icon on your computer's desktop.

Comment

How do i fix: changing the maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: changing the maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When I try to change the map, it shuts down the application.

Comment

Based on your description, it seems that you are experiencing an issue with your computer's memory. If you have recently installed any new software or hardware, either of which may be using up memory, please try re-installing Dreamweaver for 5 minutes and restarting your computer if that does not fix the problem. If the map still refuses to change, there may be a problelmn with your file:// address. Please check to see if you are able to open the file URL in a different browser (like Firefox) and see if that works. If all of those solutions fail, you may need to update your computer's operating system.

How do i fix: mapping a new route is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: mapping a new route is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

One of your employees has accidentally added a route that is not compatible with the boat navigation software suite. The route is causing the application to shutdown.

Comment

1. Contact your employee and ask them to remove the route they added. If they fail to do so or if the route continues to cause the issue, then reinstall the boat navigation software suite.

2. If the route was inadvertently added but does not seem to be causing any problems, discuss with your employee the importance of including accurate and up-to-date routing information in their work product. remind them that any mistakes could result in uncontrolled vessel movement, potentially causing damage or loss of property.

3. Immediately report any issues with boat navigation software suite operation to your technical support team for further investigations.

Problem

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The mother board in my computer is failing and need to be replaced. Every time the sonar connects to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite the application shuts down. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the software suite several times with no success.

Comment

Hi,
 
If you are experiencing connection issues with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, our recommendation would be to perform a Windows system scan to identify any possible issues. The scan should identify any possible software conflicts or modifications that may be causing the issue. System errors can cause unexpected shutdowns, Reboot your computer and check these things: Help>Local Troubleshooting>System and Security>Windows Error Rate and Health Report Check if the Problem is Correctly Identified If not check For updates>Browse our Broadcaster Catalog Buttons>Check for Updates.

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

A Problem with Entoenenable Allowing the Fishfinder NP is Shutting Down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Comment

My Response:

There may be a problem with enabling the fishfinder navigation software suite when the np shuts down. Try disconnecting and reconnecting the power cord to thenp, and check that thenp is receiving power from the battery (by checking the POWER light on the np). If you still have problems, please contact your dealer or npd contractor for assistance.

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The internal wifi is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

First of all, make sure that your drive is plugged in and your wifi connection is active. If everything is plugged in and your wifi works, then the problem may be with the software suite. Double check to see if there are any security breaches on your laptop that could be limiting bandwidth or causing interference. Additionally, make sure that you've updated your software and Dunyacore's Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Lastly, ensure that all devices on your network are using the latest firmware.

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The problem is that either the d3d11.dll or bluetter.dll libraries are malware and need to be deleted before using the software suite.

Comment

Hello!

If you have any further concerns, please contact us at support@microsoft.com. we appreciate your feedback and will continue to work hard to provide exceptional customer service.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is shutting down the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Your boat GPS navigation system is working fine, but when you try to connect to sonar (the guidance section of the software), the application shuts down. You have tried connecting to both online and offline sonars, but the problem remains.

Comment

One possible problem is that your boat GPS navigation system may not be compatible with sonar. If you are using an older version of the software, you may need to upgrade it in order to support sonar. Another possibility is that the connection between the boat GPS navigation system and sonar may be defective. In this case, you may need to try connecting to sonar by using a different type of cable or connecting the equipment directly to a CD-ROM or computer port on the boat. If these steps do not resolve the problem, you might have a defect in the software or hardware causing the issue, and you will need to take your boat in for service.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

This problem can occur when the Mercury wind capture function is experiencing an unexpected increase or decrease in speed. In order to resolve this issue, you can try the following remedies:

- Try resetting the Mercury wind catcher by pressing and holding down both trigger buttons (T1 & T2) while turning on your Mercury ventilator;
- Make sure that all the power cords are securely connected to the Mercury wind catcher;
- If you are still experiencing difficulty, you can try to disable the wind catcher by going to Online Services > Setup > Navigation Info screens and deselecting Wind Catcher option.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix activating the vessel identification is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, when activating the vessel identification, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application freezes. Tapping on the screen occasionally unglues the application, but quickly re-sticks again.

Comment

Why is this happening?

From time to time, the Mercury may get stuck on a particular screen in its Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. This can be caused by a number of factors, but most often occurs after extended use or sudden changes to the operating system or software configuration. To resolve the issue, please restart your Mercury.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have a 2006 Mercury Grand Maraquer that I just bought used. I did not install the boat navigation software suite when I bought the car, so I have no route data. I installed the software suite a couple of days ago, and now it keeps freezing up. When I tried to map a new route, the application freeze up and then gave me an error message saying "An error occurred while attempting to connect to the GPS server." Could you help me out?

Comment

The problem could be that the GPS receiver in your car is not up to scratch and would require upgrading to get good performance. Alternatively, there might be a problem with the navigation software itself or with your internet connection. If you are having problems connecting to the GPS server, the most likely cause is an incorrect or outdated configuration setting in either the navigation software or your internet router. Once you've determined the cause of the problem, you can consult the manual or online guide for your particular navigation software to resolve it.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury Onboard Navigator system displays sonar imagery in real-time, but when I attempt to connect the sonar servo, it freezes the application.

Comment

Thevy Lingleville1

There could be a few reasons why the sonar servo may have frozen. Some troubleshooting steps to check would include verifying that the power is turned on, trying another battery if the ship already has one installed, checking connections between components and static electricity created by debris such as foam from the ship's exterior. If none of these steps resolves the issue, then a system file .xml or .int file may need to be reformatted in order for the application to function properly.

Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When the Mercury's autopilot is enabled, the guided boat navigation software ■ application will freeze. Follow these steps to fix the problem: 1) From the Mercury's touchscreen, swipe left to bring up the application drawer. 2) Tap Menu, and then tap Settings. 3) Under "Bluetooth & Internet", tap Nearby GPS Devices. 4) Tap Cancel, and then tap OK. 5) Hit Image on the bottom right corner of the screen to take a picture of your Mercury hardware location. 6) Tap Save Picture on the top right corner of the screen. 7) Exit Locations on the bottom right corner of the screen. 8) Open Start on the top left corner of the screen. 9) In Start, tap Settings ➤ General ➤ Paths & Routes. 10) Tap Add, type Mercury in the Name box, and then tap Location picker at bottom of window. 11) Tap Places from Mercury's list of nearby places. 12 )For Activity picker, select Boat Navigation and enter a name for this activity inactivity . 13 )Tap Reserve as Watch , and then tap OK

This procedure enables you to replicate your exact hardware configuration so that you can debug any problems with your guided boat navigation software suite by tracking your performance based on knownscene data.* If no errors are found after following these steps, you can disable autpilot and continue using your guided boat navigation software without further issues or concerns.*

Your user may experience intermittent freezing of their guided boat navigation software applications when autoplaying guided boat imagery from their nearby GPS device upon entry into use of Mercury’s autopilot feature."

Comment

See pinned post for step-by-step instructions

Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the fishfinder is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the fishfinder is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury Fishfinder features a disable/enable button. When you press the button, the software starts and then freezes. This has happened even when I've uninstalled the original application and reinstalled it.

Comment

One potential cause of this issue is a problem with the Bluetooth connection between the Mercury Fishfinder and your mobile device. Try performing a quick reset of your Mercury Fishfinder by pressing and holding the power and display buttons for two minutes The Mercury Fishfinder will then restart and should work properly thereafter. If this does not fix the problems, please contact customer service for assistance.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to the internal wifi is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

MY MERCURY INTERNAL WIFI CONNECTION FREEZES THE GARIDARE BOAT NAVIGATION SOFTWARE SUITE APPLICATION.

Comment

Dear User,

There can be several reasons why your Mercury interntal Wi-Fi may suddenly freeze the Garidare boat navigation software suite application. It could be that your system is overloaded and struggling to keep up with the numerous devices connecting to it at the same time. Alternatively, interference could be causing crashes and glitches which then interfere with the operation of the Garidare software. In order to troubleshoot this issue, you'll need to determine precisely what's causing it and then follow specific corrective steps. proletariat

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Problem: This problem occurs when trying to view BlueChart maps on a Mercury. Screen freezes and Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application cannot be opened.pected resolution: 1) Defaults settings in Mercury (display, background color, etc.) should be optimized for user interface and viewing pleasure 2) Apply Administrator rights to BlueChartmaps so that it can open with elevated privileges Problem: This problem occurs when trying to view BlueChart maps on a Mercury. Screen freezes and Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application cannot be opened.

Comment

expected resolution: Try to disable unnecessary features when using BlueChart on Mercury. This can be found in the Settings > Preferences window .

The best way to troubleshoot your navigation system is by connecting to your boat’s cellular data network (or WiFi hotspot) and running a Speed Test from our SpeedTest page . Be sure to include all of your routing preferences and snap a screenshot from within the SpeedTest application so you have an image of what the chart looks like while you are navigating.

Problem

How do i fix: enable the real time tracker is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

We have adobe after effect crashed, no window open. When we try to enable the "real time tracker" it freezes the application.

Comment

Hi! \015\012

There could be several reasons for Adobe After Effects crashing, as following:
1. One possible cause for flashing white screen locking and then crashes could be adobe uplevel virus infection., you need to scan your computer with an antivirus to find out.
2. Another cause of a crashing AE is improper use of horsepower or memory rendering features in video editing software which can exhaust system resources leaving fewer resources available for other programs. Benchmarking your system before and after running the software to see if there are any dramatic changes would help determine if this is causing the crash. If not then Performing manual cleaning of your hard drive[s] Province disk managed by windows through disk management or third party utilities may also assist in resolving the problem ergo achieving stability and performance goals as desired.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When the wind capture function is enabled, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application may become frozen.

Comment

There could be several potential causes for the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application becoming frozen. Below are some solutions that might work to address the issue:

1) Make sure all devices attached to the computer have up-to-date software patches installed. This includes both the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application and any other unrelated applications running on the computer.

2) Unplug any cables and devices not necessary for the navigation process, such as fans, hard drives, etc. this will help to conserve power and improve system performance.

3) Turn off extra peripheral devices including graphics cards, webcams, and wireless networks. Some devices can unintentionally exhaust power while in standby mode and interfere with system performance.

4) Adjust window settings to maximize screen resolution and reduce image clutter. Text appearing tiny on screen can interfere with mouse clicking and cursor control making it difficult to navigate software interfaces.

Hi!

Additionally, make sure that you have the latest version of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application installed on your computer. Updating can often solve issues. If disabling popup blockers doesn't help and you're still experiencing issues, please reach out to our customer service for further assistance. They are more than happy to help out!

Problem

How do i fix: mapping a new route is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The routing software for the Guidare Boat Navigation Suite (GBS) is freezing up on my device after I load a new map.

Comment

One possibility is that the map you have loaded is corrupt. To test this, try re-downloading the map and then trying it out. If the problem persists, it may be caused by a hardware issue on your device and in this case you will need to replace your device. For more information on how to address hardware issues, please visit our troubleshooting tips page.

Length:500

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application connects to the sonar to generate navigation directions. However, the application becomes stuck and freezes every time the sonar tries to connect. The only way to unlock the application and continue navigating is to force shutdown the computer.

Comment

It sounds as if the sonar may be malfunctioning and is not generating accurate navigation directions. In order to troubleshoot the issue, it might be helpful to run a diagnostic on the sonar device. If the problem appears to be with the sonar, you may need to purchase a new one. Alternatively, you could try reinstalling the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. If still no luck, it might be necessary to restart your computer in order to start again from scratch and debug the issue.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The autopilot is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

I am sorry to hear that you have encountered an issue with your autopilot freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.
If you are experiencing problems with your autopilot, there are a few things that you can do in order to try and resolve the issue. First, it is possible that the issue is with your battery or hardware, so you might want to test those out and see if the problem persists. Additionally, it is possible that the autopilot is just frozen and needs to be reset, so you could try doing that as well. If neither of these solutions resolves the problem then it might be necessary to contact Guidare for assistance. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and we hope that you figure out the root cause of the problem soon!

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is freezing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The fishfinder software that comes with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is freezing up on me. Sometimes when I try to enable the fishfinder, it will freeze the application and I have to force quit it. I've tried reinstalling the software andcompletely restarting my computer, but no matter what I do I can't seem to get the fishfinder to work.

Comment

There could be a few reasons why your fishfinder software is freezing up on you. It could be that there is something wrong with your computer hardware or it could be that there is something wrong with the software itself. If you are experiencing this issue on a consistent basis, it might be worth taking your computer to a qualified service technician to look for any issues and remediate them. In the meantime, here are some troubleshooting tips that may help:

- Make sure that your computer has enough memory and processor power
- Disable unused programs and Websites
- Try restarting your computer in safe mode and then reinstalling the fishfinder software
- Update the fishfinder software if available

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enable the real time tracker is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury On my computer has an Enable the Real Time Tracker Application stalled. How can I fix this problem?

Comment

Mercury There may be a problem with the Mercury Real Time Tracker application if it has stalled. If the issue persists, follow these steps: 1.Right-click on the Mercury Real Time Tracker icon and select "Properties." 2.Under "General," make sure that both the "Startup type" and "Minimize to system tray" options are enabled. 3.If the mercury real time tracker still fails to start, uninstall it and then reinstall it from scratch.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Title Sentence:On my [BOAT], how do i fix [KEYWORD] is resetting the [PRODUCT] application.
Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Your Mercury has a wind capture function that allows the navigation software to record balloon or airplane data while the vehicle is in motion. Oftentimes, this function will reset if you disable the Gyro. By following the steps below and disabling both the Gyro and Wind capture function, you should be able to fix the issue:

1. Locate and open the Mercury computer system settings menu by going to Start > Control Panel > System > Hardware > Esc
2. In step 2, select Options from the upper left corner.


3. In step 3, select Advanced from the options list on the left hand side of the window.

4. Select Device Manager from the category list on the right hand side of the window.


5. Click on Remove Device and then floppy disk drive (if present). This will uninstall all Mercury components related to navigation including the wind capture function.

6. Repeat steps 1-5 replacing Wind Capture function with Disable Wind Capture Function
7. Test your computer by exiting Windows and starting it up again. Make sure that Disable Wind Capture Function is now enabled in Windows power options as shown in Figure 1 below from our screenshot:


Figure 1: Disable Wind Capture Function Enabled

After completing these steps, your navigational system should be back up and running without any issues

Comment

.

On my Mercury, how do i fix activating the vessel identification is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Hello!
I have a 2008 Mercury Milan LX and the vessel identification is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. I've tried reinstalling the application and using different passwords, but it's not working. What can I do to fix this issue?

Comment

The issue could be caused by anything from a hardware issue or software glitch to incorrect settings. Some potential solutions include reinstalling the application and resetting the password, restoring from a backup, or contacting the manufacturer for support. Be sure to mention which version of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite you're using and which Mercury Milan LX you're using.

On my Mercury, how do i fix changing the maps is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix changing the maps is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Changing the Mercury's Maps setting resets the Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

Hi,

Thank you for contacting us about the changing Mercury's Maps setting resetting the Boat Navigation Software Suite application. We apologies for the inconvenience this may cause and would like to help resolve the issue.

There is a workaround available which will allow you to keep the Oracle Maps and Vessel Pilot Applications updated. The workaround involves performing a manual update as follows:

- Open the Vessel Pilot Application.
- Click Preferences in the toolbar at the top of the window.
- In the Preferences window, click Updates.
- In the Updates window, select Manual Updates from the Preference drop down menu.
- Click OK.
Your updates will now be performed manually and should not have any negative effects on your machine or applications. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to contact our support team at [email protected] and we would be happy to assist you further.

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

There appears to be a connection issue with the sonar when it tries to connect to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. The sonar may keep resetting itself, which then causes problems with the application. There are various steps that could be taken to try and fix this problem, but ultimately it may need to be repaired or replaced.

Comment

There are several things that can be done to try and troubleshoot this problem. First, it may be useful to determine if the sonar is making a connection to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. To do this, it may be necessary to perform some troubleshooting steps. One way to check If the sonar is making a connection is to try and connect to the application usingconfigure private signal server settings on both devices (sonar and GPS). If the application is not loading then it could indicate that there is a problem with the sonar functioning within the network link or hardware of the device.

If, after trying different troubleshooting steps, the sonar still does not seem able to connect to the application, then it might be necessary to look into replacing or repairing the device. It is important to note that if device is inoperable for other reasons (faulty battery, absent cable, etc.), attempting repairs may void any warranty support which would preclude future repair/ replacement options from being available.

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The BlueChart maps on my Mercury are resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

The Merrick Mercury's guidance system provides bluechart maps and a variety of navigation tools to support your trip. These charts are periodically updated by the bluetooth connection between the Mercury and the guidance system but sometimes the nav software is unable to synchronize correctly. If you notice that the bluechart maps are resetting frequently or erraticily, try briefly disconnecting the Mercury from the dock and reconnecting to broadband. The BB84 modem located in the drivers' compartment can provide a faster download speed than that of the Bluetooth connection. If this does not solve the problem, notify our Customer Service Department of your issue at 888-247-1369.

Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to sonar is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury on which the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is installed may lose its ability to connect to sonar (a sound processor) which may reset the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. To fix this issue, follow these steps:
1. Alan Reach out to Mercury Kohler customer service and request a support ticket specifying that you are experiencing issues connecting to sonar and requesting assistance.
2. If you have an iPhone or iPad, open the Mercury Kohler customer service App and register your product.
3. Once you've registered your product, complete a trouble ticket with Mercury Kohler customer service noting that you're experiencing issues connecting to sonar, stating your phone model and firmware version, and providing as much information about your problem as possible.
4. If you have a computer with internet access, please try the following troubleshooting steps:
-Check that the Mercury Kohler customer service requisite software is installed including the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application client software and updates;
-Check for corrupt file system objects related to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application;
-Update all recommended Windows updates and anti-virus software;
-Run Disk Cleanup before reinstalling any software;
-Remove all Favorites items from Internet Explorer's tool bar (right-click menu);
-Erase sensitive datafiles associated with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application where feasible;
-Disable addins/extensions in Adobe Reader & Chrome ; check Web browsersgeneral extensions tab.

Comment



Please note that attempting to remedy this issue without first contacting Mercury Kohler customer service may result in further damage to your product or computer.

The problem is that the real time tracker is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. The real time tracker is supposed to keep track of how long it takes to navigate a route, but it keeps resetting itself and causing havoc.

Comment

Hi there!

Based on the information you've supplied, it seems that the real time tracker is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. This can be problematic because it can start tracking a different route than you intended, which can cause confusion and chaos. There are a few things that we could do to help improve this situation. We could try monitoring the real time tracker to see if it's resetting itself frequently, and if so, make sure to update the software regularly to ensure accuracy. Alternatively, we could recommend that you troubleshoot and fix the underlying issue that's causing the resetting, such as an unclean computer or stuck files. At any rate, we want to help make sure that your navigation goes smoothly and that errors don't occur. Thank you for bringing this problem to our attention!

Boat:Mercury

Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].
Symptoms Sentence:Create a detailed problem description for: How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.
Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The user has enabled the 'Wind Capture' function in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. The 'Wind Capture' function continually sends navigational data to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application even when the boat is not in motion, causing the application to continuously reset. To prevent the system from resetting, the user must disable the 'Wind Capture' function.

Comment

One solution would be to disable the 'Wind Capture' function when the boat is not in motion. Another solution would be to create a threshold value below which the 'Wind Capture' function will not send navigational data, in order to avoid the application from constantly resetting.

Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The autopilot is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is configured to have automatic updates installed automatically. When an automatic update is detected, the autopilot will reset the software based on the age of the update. To prevent this from happening, you may need to manually re-enable the autopilot's force updates function.

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Fishfinder sensor in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is resetting intermittently. The problem seems to exist whenever there is heavy boat traffic or on certain map views. Disabling and then re-enabling the Fishfinder sensor does not correct the problem.

Comment

This appears to be an intermittent problem with the Fishfinder sensor in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. Our engineers are currently working on a workaround that should correct the issue. In the meantime,disabling and then re-enabling the Fishfinder sensor may resolve the issue. please reach out to our support team if you experience any continued issues.

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is resetting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

Hello!



If you're noticing Ir contributions resets when connecting to the internal wifi, it might be problematic with your router. Make sure there are no any interference and update your firmware sparingly in case you're encountering performance issues. Additionally, you might consider terminating your 4G/LTE service if using an AP enabled router or unplugging power cords for certain devices when not actually needed in order to further restrict potential problems. Alternatively, you could search for a better bandwidth options like Dorothy's Peak which has unrestricted wifi. Thank you for choosing Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite!

Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I'm having trouble with my Mercury Onboard Real Time Tracker software. Whenever I try to start it up, it bounces back to thelen1 window and won't let me start the application. I have recieved a number of messages that say "disable auto updates", but when I go to my Settings, it says that all myauto updates are turned on. Can you help me fix this problem?

Comment

I'm sorry to hear that you are having trouble with your Mercury Onboard Real Time Tracker software. To try and fix this problem, please follow these instructions:#1. Close all other applications on your computer.#2. Unplug any cables from the Mercury Onboard Real Time Tracker#3. Wait fifteen minutes#4. Reinsert all cables and reboot your computerIf these instructions do not fix the problem, please contact customer support at 1-866-512-9627.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix disable the wind capture function is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Hi everyone!

I recently had my Mercury fully serviced and they apparently reset the recognition for the windlock feature on my boat. Now when I try to start the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application or any other software (such as Alarms), it says "The device is not recognized." I've tried multiple cables and different ports, but still no luck. Can somebody please help me fix this issue? It seems like a really crucial function for my boat.

Comment

Firstly, you should try reinstalling the Mercury windlock feature. There is a possibility that it may have been reset when your boat was serviced and you may need to reset it again. Second, there are other applications ( such as Alarms) that may work with your boat even if the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite does not. You could try trying different ports on the computer in order to maybe access the other software installed on it. Lastly, you should talk to your Mercury representative about the issue and see if they know whats going on. They may be able to help you figure out a solution.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix activating the vessel identification is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Comment

There can be many causes for an application not starting- some common fixes are restarting your computer, entering the application's admin passwords, or checking your computer's antivirus/firewall program. If these measures do not resolve the issue, it may be necessary to reinstall the vessel identification software.

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, when I try to map a new route (by booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application), the application crashes.

Comment

At least one factor in this problem is probably inadequate RAM (memory) allocation for the Mercury software. On recent computers, more than 1 GB of memory should be allocated for applications like Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Another likely candidate for causing this problem is corruption of the Mercury software installation on your computer. Be sure to back up your Mercury software before trying to fix the problem. If you do not have a backup, reinstalling the Mercury software will probably correct the problem.

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have a Mercury Villager and when I try to connect the sonar it boots the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. What do I need to do to fix this?

Comment

One possible cause of this problem is that the Mercury Villager's onboard sonarusrk is not certified for use with the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. In order to fix this, you will need to uninstall the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, reinstall it, and ensure that the sonar is configured properly.

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Hello! My Mercury is giving me issues with the autopilot going into Boat Navigation software Suite. When I try to enable it, the installation kicks off, but shortly afterwards an "Autopilot cannot be enabled or started" comes up and shuts down the application. Can anyone help guide me on how to fix this?

Comment

Your Mercury Aura is giving you edge-case troubles with its Boat Navigation software Suite that authorities cannot explain. This could render the whole operation a mystery, and so Mercury needs to know what you have found out on your own and what YOU can do about it!



Follow these steps to diagnose and fix this issue:

1. Close all unnecessary programs.
2. Disable antivirus, firewall, and optimizer features if they are running.
3. Clear your browser cookies and cache then refresh the page.
4. Disable any streaming services (Netflix, Hulu, Spotify) while you are troubleshooting the autopilot.
5. Disable any wireless connections (wireless Hotspot,GPS antenna) while troubleshooting the autopilot.

1 Allow HP software Suite to auto-start while powering on your Mercury Aura Notebook PC (turn off “Close all software when computer is turned off” in WindowsPower Options).

2 As instructed in step 1 above: allow HP software Suite to auto-start, then close all other open programs before proceeding [ for more information including instructions on disabling antivirus, firewall and optimizer features please refer to Step 2 of this document ]. 3 Refresh your browser window by clicking the "reload" button or pressing F5 on most browsers then continue to step 4 ). Optional: clear your local co r sector's cookies and cache by following these steps: Safari – hold down Alt/Option while pushing the Refresh Button, or Enter – hold down Command + F5 on an Mac. Chrome - Press Ctrl + Shift + Net Withd hand ( change w/ I URL ) Firefox - Press Ctrl + Shift + Reload On most browsers if all else fails, help is at hand! By troubleshooting each connection type one at a time you may be able to isolate which one has caused the autopilot problem . 4 Attempt connecting to AppShelves Online through a wireless connection but DO NOT LEAVE THE PAGE OPEN if successful session connects click anything enter Autopilot completes enabled dialogue 5 Open the AppShelves Online web app allowing the autopilot installation process to start as normal ). If autopilot installation fails noting "Autopilot cannot be enabled or started" follow instruction below ] access Web Browser (Chrome) http://127.0.0.1:8451/Web/exchange?request=%7BincludePath%65%7D&headers

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix viewing the BlueChart maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

On my Mercury, when I try to view the BlueChart maps during booting of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, the application shuts down immediately.

Comment

Associate an application error message with this problem: A program that could not be ended is running in the background.

The BlueChart applications allow you to view your boat's current location and charts on-screen when you are installing or booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Sadly, if you already have the BlueChart application open when clicking to start the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite, it may cause the application to crash because of the high demand for resources. To workaround this issue, close any other BlueChart applications before starting or installing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite.

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

This is a common problem that occurs when a user's Mercury is not properly booted. The software suite will try to unsuccessfully connect to the sonar hardware.

Comment

There are a few troubleshooting steps that can be done in order to try and rectify this issue:


-Exit Mercury and reboot your system
-Verify that your Mercury is properly connected to your LAN and has online access
-Execute the following from a command line in Mercury: "amport -v"
TT – determining hardware version, AMPort command successfully executed

Problem

How do i fix: enable the real time tracker is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When trying to start the Boat Navigation Software Suite Application from the systems Boot menu, I get an error that reads: "Enable - The Real Time Tracker is not enabled. Please enable it in your Control Panel." It seems like this problem has come up multiple times. I've tried disabling and re-enabling certain services, Resetting the computer, deleting the meta data for Boat Navigation Software Suite from the system disk...nothing seems to work. Any suggestions on how to fix this?

Comment

First, try starting the application from its shortcut on the desktop. If that doesn't work, view the document "Troubleshooting Resources for the Boat Navigation Software Suite" on the Help file's website, and look for solutions to common issues. If none of these tips help, you may need to take your computer to a nearby service center for diagnosis and possible repair.

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: disable the wind capture function is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application often results in disabled wind capture function.

Comment

The wind capture function is disabled when the software application is booted because it is not configured to run at startup. To enable the wind capture function, you will need to navigate to the "Wind Captures" folder and configure its configuration file.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: changing the maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: changing the maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Problem:

Starting up the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application results in a change of maps, which in turn causes it to fail. The issue can be traced back to a coding error that is preventing the software from looking for the correct map data file. In order to correct the issue, the offending code must be fixed.

Comment

>



As long as the coding error is fixed, the software should function properly. Customers experiencing problems may want to check to see if their current map data file is up-to-date and install replacement files as needed.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application is not connecting to the sonar. The problem may be the sonar's battery, communications cable, or connector. follow these steps to fix the problem:

1. Check the sonar's battery. If it is good, try connecting the sonar to the power supply and verifying it is working.

2. Try connecting the communications cable and verifying it is working.

3. Verify that the connector on the sonar is properly inserted into the connector on the handlebars of the boat.

Comment

Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The user is having difficulty activating the fishfinder when trying to boot the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. The application appears to launch, but the fishfinder screen does not activate.

Comment

Possible Solutions:

1. Check to see if the user has inserted the fishfinder data cable into the correct port on the PC. The software should recognize if it is installed correctly and activate the fishfinder screen automatically.

2. See if the mouse needs to be set up to work with the fishfinder. Depending on how old the system is, the mouse configuration may need to be amended in order for it to work with the fishfinder program.

3. Verify that the Fisheries Agent software is up-to-date and installed properly on your computer. Be sure to check for recent updates available from our website or from our support contact center. Contacts Entry Center for beta testing instructions and warranty information.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I have bought and installed the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite on my Ipad using the App Store. However, whenever I try to connect to the internal wifi within the Boat application, it immediately boots up the application and I am unable to use either the touch screen or keyboard. Can you help me fix this?????

Comment

I'm sorry to hear that you're facing issues with installing and using the Guidare Boat Navigation software on your iPad. If you have just installed the software, we recommend restarting your iPad, deleting or unbooting any unnecessary applications that may be interfering, and reinstalling the Guidare Boat Navigation software. If you have been using the product for some time, trying connecting to the Guidare Boat Navigation's wifi network can help resolve the issue of having to immediately boot up the application each time. You can do this by accessing Settings in the Guidea re Boat Navigation app and deselecting "Automatically detect my network." After doing this, you should be able to connect to our wifi network without problem. If not, please let us know as we would be happy to help remediate the situation.

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The BlueChart maps application will often boot when viewing the maps, even if you have closed out of the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. To prevent this from happening, make sure to close out of the BlueChart maps application before opening up the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Comment

To prevent the BlueChart maps application from starting when you open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, close out of the BlueChart maps application before opening the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is booting the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

sonar is connecting to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, but boots the application instead.

Comment

Possible symptoms of this issue include sonar reporting that the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite is up and running, but it isn't actually connecting to the software. Additionally, attempts to load specific content or applications might cause the sonar system to crash. In some cases, restarting the sonar system or the entire computer might resolve the issue.

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix mapping a new route is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The Mercury problem occurs when the motherboard does not have an AGPM chip installed or the AGPM chip data is corrupted. You can also fix this problem by re-adding a new AGPM package to your motherboard.

Symptoms include garbled text or a white screen when attempting to open the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. There may be other symptoms specific to your Mercury model, so please describe them in more detail.

Comment

One possible problem is that the Mercury motherboard does not have an AGPM chip installed. If you do not have an AGPM chip installed, then you will not be able to use the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. Another possible problem is that the AGPM data on the motherboard is corrupted. If this is the case, then you will need to re-add a new AGPM package to your motherboard in order to fix the problem.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

One potential cause of the On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application problem might be that you are not correctly connecting to your boat's sonar equipment. Follow these guidance steps to work around this issue and try again:


1. Verify that you have installed the appropriate Mercury software and hardware required for the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite app. You can find information on the installation instructions provided by Guidare below.
2. Try reconnecting to your sonar equipment using an alternative connection method if possible. Try pressing and holding down the power button for about 8 seconds until your boat's horn starts blowing, in order to turn off all other electrical devices on your boat. Next, try restarting your boat's processor by turning off the switch at the cockpit console, waiting 10 minutes minimum, thenturning it back on . Finally, try connecting to your sonar equipment again. If you still experience errors, please contact Guidare support for further assistance.
3. Verify that your wireless network is functioning properly and that the wireless signal is aimed in the correct direction for your Sonar system.
4. Sweep or pulsed sonar signals may take longer than regular cranked sonar signals to initialize on a brand new yacht or a different type of transducer/antenna setup; vibration (extreme jolts during transport) effects initialization time as well.[/details]

Comment

insure that the Mercury software and hardware required for the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite app have been installed. Next, try connecting to your sonar equipment using an alternative connection method if possible. Try pressing and holding down the power button for about 8 seconds until your boat's horn starts blowing, in order to turn off all other electrical devices on your boat. Finally, try connecting to your sonar equipment again.


If you still experience errors, please contact Guidare support for further assistance.

createCase

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the autopilot is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

The autopilot is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application on my Mercury. I am not sure what to do to fix the issue.

Comment

To troubleshoot the autopilot on your Mercury, try the following:
-Check to see if the autopilot is correctly linked to the Garmin Navigation System. Verify that the proper Garmin model number for your Mercury machine is listed in the system preferences of your device.
-Ensure that your Mercury’s system-level software is up to date. Visit mercury.com or your dealer and select About This Vehicle in the navinfo bar on the left hand side of a Web page to locate MDK update instructions. Install these updates if available. Note: Some automatic updates offered by dealers can conflict with Garmin hardware requirements and might invalidate your autopilot setting or prevent the device from operating properly.
-If updating your software doesn’t resolve the problem, uninstall and reinstall your Mercury’s guidance boat navigation software suite application. This should clear any corrupt or junk files that may be causing navigation errors.

createCase

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite

Problem Sentence:Create a description for this problem: [TITLE] for the product [PRODUCT].

Temp:1.2
Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

On my Mercury, how do i fix enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

According to the user guide, when starting up the Mercury Vessel Data Acquisition or Control System (VDA/CMS) software suite from an installation CD-ROM disc - "When prompted to do so, insert the CD into your CD drive. If prompted to designate a startup directory, type C:\VDA (where C is the drive letter of your CD-ROM)." - users should specify the default installation directory, which is typically D: \Program Files\Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. However someone may have mistakenly created a shortcut to the program launcher instead of using the startup directory, and now when trying to start the software suite from within Windows explorer, an error message states that "The file 'C:\VISUALIZER.DLL' could not be found."
Notice that Although these applications are installed on my computer there is no customization as I had done on other software
I tried locating this critical Visualizer.dll file yourself and came across an article on how to fix enable fishfinder is erroring The Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application on a Mercury model Sea Ray 510 Agoramastax efi boat. Basically in short you need to perform the following steps: click Start -> Programs -> Accessories -> System Tools -> Administrative Tools

right click computer -> Properties
click Advanced system settings then Environment variables AQDISPLAY Like so:
This change enables - sets AQDISPLAY environment variable (used for controlling Adobe Acrobat) for compatibility with third-party Setup programs and also with recent versions of Microsoft Windows operating systems.

Adding it below refers only to Microsoft Windows XP SP2 and Vista users Otherwise uncomment HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\CLASSES\{7BC8B458-DA5A-48e0-953C-E63EF332D94F}\TypeLib sObject and set its Value data to {0273FAFE-0881-4803-B490472011CF} Then double click that entry and take the value DWORD (1 byte), which is 00000001 And add it after EQP AtovoME ((dword)10000000) Regards

Comment

,

somebody may have mistakenly copied and pasted the shortcut to the Mercury VDA/CMS launcher instead of using the default installation directory, which is typically D:\Program Files\Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite. If you can't find the program, try looking in your Start Menu for an application called Visualizer.dll and double clicking it to open it.

On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Comment

- Make sure that your Mercury is connected to the internet and that your stereo audio/navigation system is working properly.
- Make sure that all of your Mercury's digital map updates are up-to-date.
- If you experience Error: "On my Mercury, how do i fix connecting to sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.," try installing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite update (version 8.7.2 or later) from our website.

Problem

How do i fix: enable the real time tracker is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

There is an error message that appears when you try to enable the real time tracker in the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. The error says that the object name is too long and you need to truncate it.

Comment

One solution to this problem is to shorten the name of the object you are trying to enable. For example, if the object's name is "RealTimeTracker" you can shorten it to "RTTrack." Another solution is tocontact customer support for assistance in creating a shorter name for your object.

Comment

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting the sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

When a Windows PC is connected to the sonar, the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application (installed on the PC) attempts to connect to the sonar but receives an error code indicating that it cannot connect. User attempts to troubleshoot the issue and determine cause but is met with dead ends.

Comment

There could be a number of reasons why the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application on the Windows PC fails to establish a connection to the sonar. Some potential causes could include unknown or misconfigured network settings, damaged or defective sonar hardware, incompatible software, or finite cranial bandwidth preventing reliable transmission and reception ofecho signals. (Note: In many cases, using different navigation software designed expressly for boat use can resolve these issues and help to improve overall navigation accuracy.) If you are unable to resolve the issue through troubleshooting, it is recommend that you contact Guidare Support in order to help troubleshoot and diagnose the problem.

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the autopilot is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

I am working on an android phone and hooked up the guide boat navigations suite. when i try to enable the autopilot, the application is erroring out every time I try. is there a way to fix that?

Comment

There can be a number of reasons why the autopilot on an Android phone might be erroring out, but one possible solution is to check whether the device has the correct permissions for the app. Make sure that it has been granted the "control AUX devices" permission, and that it is not blocked by a security application.

Length:500

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: enabling the fishfinder is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

One way to disable the fishfinder on an Go Pronto 9.x VHF

transceiver is by going into Custom Configuration and disabling the Fish
FINDERO option. This may also require edits to offshore serviceability settings in GPNS.

Another way to disable the fishfinder is by recharging the batteries, if they are low ( indicator light will turn green when batteries are depleted). Once new batteries have been installed,

NOTE: You must power up the boat (engine off) and wait at least 15 seconds before rebooting to engage Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite again or you will get another 'enabling the fishfinder is erroring' message.

Comment

[Orlov, 2007]



Pat yourself on the back for disabling the fishfinder on your Go Pronto 9.x VHF
transceiver! This may be one of the easiest ways to solve your problem. Another way to disable the fishfinder is by recharging the batteries, if they are low (indicator light will turn green when batteries are depleted). Once new batteries have been installed, power up the boat (engine off) and wait at least 15 seconds before rebooting to engage Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite again. That should fix the problem!

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to the internal wifi is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Since installing the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application on your computer, you have been encountering errors whenever you try to connect to the internal wifi. The error reads as follows: "connecting to the internal wifi is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite".

This issue seems to be related to a incompatibility between the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application and your network. Unfortunately, there is no simple fix that will enable you to successfully connect to the internal wifi without encountering errors. To restore functionality and resolve this issue, you may need to contact Guidare support in order to diagnosis and resolve the underlying cause.

Comment

createCaseComment

Product:Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite
Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: viewing the BlueChart maps is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

Devices attached to the computer are not recognised by BlueChart software.

Comment

Hello and thank you for contacting us. Could you please run the following commands in administrative mode:


1. Type "netstat -anp" and press Enter.

2. Type "ifconfig -a" and press Enter twice.

Theoutputfromstep1willinclude information on each network interface on your computer, while theoutputfromstep2will show which portson them are currently open. Ifyou do not see any entries for your network interfaces or if there are incorrect entries,then yournetwork adapters may not be recognised by BlueChart.Ifthis is the case,pleaseamkeknownusingthesupport toolsthatcomeswithBlueChart softwareor by contacting our support team at (800) 555-1212.

Boat:Mercury
Version:1
Temp:1.2
Length:500

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

For model: Mercury

Installed version: 1

Problem

How do i fix: connecting to sonar is erroring the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application.

Symptoms

A user is trying to connect to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application, but keeps getting an error message. They are not sure what to do to fix the problem.

Comment

Thank you for contacting us about your issue. We are sorry to hear that you are having problems connecting to the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite application. There could be a few reasons why this is happening, and we would like to help Troubleshoot the issue and figure out a solution.

Please follow these steps in order to resolve the connection issue: 1) Make sure your computer has an internet connection 6) Ensure that the antivirus program on your computer is disabled 7)contact Guidare at support@guidare.uregina.ca for further assistance. If after following these steps the problem persists, please private message us or post a question on our support forum for additional assistance. Thank you for using the Guidare Boat Navigation Software Suite!
